for life and their place in it with an unforgettable evening, but to raise awareness about the issues that these little ones are forced to encounter, finding themselves in the marginalized side of our society.Yerevan Zoo is the first zoo in the entire region to join the global “Dreamnight at the Zoo” Network.«Երազանքի գիշեր Երևանի կենդանաբանական այգում»Հունիսի 28-ն Երևանի կենդանաբանական այգու առաջին «Երազանքի գիշերը» կհյուրընկալի անբուժելի հիվանդ և սահմանափակ կարողություններով ավելի քան 60 երեխաների, նրանց ծնողներին (խնամակալներին), քույրերին և եղբայրներին:Հրավիրվածներին կընդունեն որպես հատուկ կարևորության հյուրերի՝ առաջարկելով հյուրասիրություն, լավ երաժշտություն, խաղեր ու նվերներ: Փոքրիկ հյուրերը հնարավորություն կունենան կենդանաբանական այգում հատուկ շրջայցի և կենդանիների հետ անմիջական շփման: «Երազանքի գիշեր Երևանի կենդանաբանական այգու» նախաձեռնությունն իրականացնում է Վայրի բնության և մշակութային արժեքների պահպանման հիմնադրամը:Միջոցառման ծրագիրը կունենա հատուկ մաս՝ «Իրականացնենք երեխայի երազանքը» խորագրով, որի շրջանակում կազմակերպիչները դոնորների և աջակիցների հետ համատեղ կփորձեն իրականացնել հրավիրված երեխաների երազանքները:Նախաձեռնության առաքելությունը ոչ միայն անմոռանալի երեկո նվիրելն է երեխաներին, որ ապրում են կյանքի ու դրանում իրենց տեղի համար պայքարի մեջ, այլև բարձրաձայնելն այն հավելյալ խնդիրների մասին, որոնց նրանք ստիպված են բախվել՝ ակամա հայտնվելով մեր հասարակության մարգինալ հատվածում:Երևանի կենդանաբանական այգին առաջինն է տարածաշրջանում, որ միանում է «Երազանքի գիշեր կենդանաբանական այգում» համաշխարհային ցանցին:«Երազանքի գիշեր կենդանաբանական այգում» համաշխարհային ցանց «Երազանքի գիշեր կենդանաբանական այգում» համաշխարհային ցանցի անդամներն աշխարհի տարբեր երկրների կենդանաբանական այգիներ են  (Նիդերլանդների, Գերմանիայի, Ճապոնիայի, ԱՄՆ-ի, Կանադայի, Մեքսիկայի, Չինաստանի, Հնդկաստանի և այլն), որոնց առաքելությունն է ամեն տարի կենդանաբանական այգի հրավիրել սահմանափակ կարողություններով կամ անբուժելի հիվանդ երեխաների և անմոռանալի օր նվիրել նրանց: Երազանքի գիշերները սովորաբար կազմակերպվում են հունիս կամ դեկտեմբեր ամիսներին:Օրվա կարևոր բաղադրիչներից մեկն այն է, որ երեխաներն այգի կայցելեն իրենց ընտանիքների՝ ծնողների, քույր-եղբայրների և/կամ խնամակալների հետ, քանի որ վերջիններս նույնպես բազմաթիվ դժվարությունների են հանդիպում հատուկ ուշադրություն պահանջող երեխաների խնամքն իրականացնելիս: «Երազանքի գիշերվա» ընթացքում հրավիրվածներին ընդունում են որպես հատուկ կարևորության հյուրերի. այգու մուտքը փակ է լինում այլ այցելուների համար, և անվճար՝ հրավիրված երեխաների և նրանց ծնողների համար:Բացի այդ, նրանց համար կազմակերպվում են համերգներ, թատերական ներկայացումներ, ծանոթացում ու «շփում» կենդանիների հետ, հյուրասիրություն և այլն: «Երազանքի գիշեր կենդանաբանական այգում» ցանցի անդամներից յուրաքանչյուրը կազմակերպում է միջոցառումն ըստ տեղի հնարավորությունների, սակայն հետևյալ պահանջները պետք է պարտադիր բավարարվեն.-  Անվճար մուտք հյուրերի համար-  Այգու մուտքն այլ այցելուների համար փակ է-  Հրավերները պետք է բաժանվեն բացառապես  մանկատների, հավատարմագրված  կազմակերպությունների կամ բժշկական հաստատությունների միջոցով- Երեխաներին և նրանց ծնողներին պետք է դիմավորել հատուկ հյուրընկալությամբ, հյուրերը պետք է օգտվեն այգու բոլոր հնարավորություններից անվճար:

story:
Become a PARTNER in Israel's first Start-up Winery and enjoy Wine for Life

Our award-winning wines are kosher to Mehadrin, kosher for Passover, and vegan. 

CONNECT TO ISRAEL THROUGH WINE

We are Israel's first start-up boutique winery.

Achieving in only three years what most wineries take 10 years to, Jezreel Valley Winery creates wines that are distinctly Israeli, but also reflect our modern approach to winemaking using a unique synthesis of varietals (including Israel's own Argaman grape) and best practices from Napa to Bordeaux. 

This indiegogo campaign is a funding round for a physical extension of our facility and operations in Israel.  We want you, our extended community of friends, family, wine and Israel lovers, to become our partners in the next chapter of our story; the next stage of our dream. Many of you we've already met over the last three years have told us how much you would love to get involved at the ground level with Israeli winemaking. You love wine, you told us. You love Israel. So do we. 

This is a way in. Join us as we launch this next stage of what we call "Wine for Life." 

WHAT IS WINE FOR LIFE?

At Jezreel, we have a concept we call "Wine for Life," which has two meanings -- one, to celebrate life with wine, and two, to literally create a connection with community members where we commit to providing wine for the rest of their lives. 

Every year as a PARTNER you will receive wine from us, with no additional cost (how much wine depends on level of partnership). Wine for Life is about celebrating our successes together with our PARTNERS and the wonder and holy magic of creating and enjoying wine from Israel.


THE JEZREEL VALLEY WINERY STORY

Jacob Ner-David and Yehuda Nahar met in 2009 along with their families and others, to revive Kibbutz Hanaton, a destination familiar to many North Americans as a favorite locale for summer youth programs to Israel. Motivated by the desire to reconnect with the land and to live with like-minded friends in harmony as a community, Jacob and Yehuda joined the Kibbutz and in 2011 founded Jezreel Valley Winery, a professional extension of the dream. Soon after, they recruited Ari Erle as consulting winemaker, and Shlomo Shmilovitz (Momo) as partner, and the team set out to make high-quality wine with a Jezreel twist.

From the selection of varietals to the branding of the winery, Jacob and Yehuda were guided by their love of wine and people -- they wanted to develop wine that would win prizes, but most important they wanted to be a winery that was accessible and enjoyable to their friends and family.



PARTNER'S WINE

As a PARTNER you will enjoy special access to wines that we will not produce at commercial levels, and will not be found in stores or restaurants. These wines will be set aside for you, our PARTNERS, our extended family.

From year to year, harvest to harvest, our selections will change, depending on multiplicity of factors, ranging from grape quality, yield, and tastings along the way.

The best way to enjoy PARTNER wine is here at our winery on Kibbutz Hanaton. PARTNERS receive exclusive access to our tours, winemaking events, and tastings. Next best is together with other wine lovers in your own local communities. We guarantee you that your friends will eagerly await their annual invitation to taste what wine reached your doorstep that year!

In addition to the wine, we invite you to be a part of the process, from pruning to picking to bottling. All along the journey you will receive updates (including videos) from the team here at Jezreel Valley Winery -- so that when the wine finally reaches you it will be the culmination of a process you followed and participated in.

In addition, you will be invited to our annual Wine for Life events in New York and in Israel for barrel tastings, where you will be able to taste samples from our future barrels, rate the wine, and vote for the next Jezreel Valley Partner's wine selection.

You will truly help us to choose our Future Wine.

HOW DO WE DO WINE?

Our goal is to make wine that is high quality, but reasonably priced, so it may be enjoyable by both the casual wine drinker and the master sommelier. Not an easy feat, but we're already doing it!

Recently acknowledged by the Terravino Wine competition with a silver medal (RedBlend 2012), the Jezreel Valley Winery wines have already been featured in leading restaurants in Israel with the most discerning wine lists, as well as served to visiting delegations from all over the world.

In three short years, we created an award-winning winery producing tens of thousands of bottles of wine. We took wines that had never been combined before and created our unique RedBlend, bringing to the forefront Israeli varietal Argaman (an Israeli-born grape invented at the Weizmann Institute), and reviving Carignan, a classic grape in Israeli wines brought to new levels. 

Our Chardonnay is a known varietal, but with a Jezreel twist -- winning over both master sommeliers and people who never before truly enjoyed a glass of wine. 

We renovated an abandoned kibbutz building (at one time, a repair garage for fixing tractors!) into a state-of-the-art winery, including wine press, fermentation tanks, barrels new and old, temperature controlled barrel room, bottle storage, and a visitor center that already has welcomed groups such as the National GA and Winter Family mission of the Jewish Federation of North America, delegations from Europe and Asia, and much more. 

It's been a most surprising and rewarding beginning.

Now, you can be our PARTNER as we take our next step and as we continue to grow our community. You, too, can enjoy Wine for Life. 



WHAT ELSE CAN YOU DO TO HELP?

After becoming a PARTNER in Jezreel Valley Winery by signing up for one of our partnership packages, tell your friends! Direct them to our website (www.jezreelwinery.com), our Facebook page, and recommend when in the area to come by the winery. Any friend of a PARTNER is a friend of ours, and we will give them VIP service, tour of the winery, tastings -- our home is your home is their home. We mean it!

FAQs ON WINE FOR LIFE AND BECOMING OUR PARTNER

When will I get my code for discounts on Wine for Life?

Within two weeks of the campaign's end, we'll be in touch with you directly with information on how to redeem all of the perks.

What do I get when I visit you in Israel? Any special attention?

Yes. Our partners, regardless of the level at which you participate in the campaign, are treated like family when you are in Israel. We highly recommend calling us or emailing in advance to let us know when you'll be in town and who you will be travelling with so we can schedule your visit and custom design it to fit your taste and style. You'll get premium access to our facility and we will make it clear to your guests just how instrumental you've been in our success story. We can't wait to see you!

When is your next Partners Only barrel tasting event and where?

Our next Partners Only barrel tasting event will be in New York in January 2015. We'll be in touch with all our partners at least two months in advance with more details.

I want to claim the Wine for Life Silver or Gold Partner perk. How soon can I have my event at Jezreel Valley Winery?

We're so excited for you and look forward to being part of your special day. Occasions like yours are the perfect match for our mission and vision for the winery. We can host your event after September 1, 2014.  After the campaign ends, we'll be in touch with you directly to learn more about your special event. Please note: The event at the winery does not include catering, but does include a bottle of wine on every table (up to 15 bottles). Some additional fees may apply depending on the amount of guests (ie. renting additional tables/chairs.)



THE JEZREEL VALLEY WINERY WINES

The 2012 harvest was our first harvest with a total production of 25,000 bottles.

The result was three new and exciting wines.

2012: REDBLEND

The winery flagship wine, won a silver medal at the national Terravino challenge.  The wine comes from the varietals Argaman, Carignan and Syrah and is aged for 16 months in French oak barrels.

2012: CHADONNAY

Wonderful fruity Chardonnay wine aged in oak barrels. Sold out.

2012: ROSE

Refreshing Rose with beautiful fruit aromas and light sweetness from the varietals Argaman and Syrah. Sold out.

The 2013 harvest maintained a similar line of creativity and innovation with a total production of 52,000 bottles. In this harvest we produced a second batch of our flagship wine and added two new wines:

2013: BLENDLAVAN

An unorthodox fusion of three white varietals: Gewürztraminer, Riesling and Chardonnay that together create a fresh and light white wine filled with floral aromas.

2013: SWEET

A dessert wine from 100% Gewürztraminer grapes.



Legal Stuff: Please review these terms and conditions prior to participating in this campaign: (1)  Jezreel Valley Winery's obligations to you under this campaign shall terminate, without notice, (i) upon the institution by or against you or Jezreel Valley Winery of insolvency, receivership or bankruptcy proceedings or any other proceedings for the settlement of either party’s debts, (ii) upon Jezreel Valley Winery's dissolution or ceasing to do business; or (iii) upon your death; and (2)  Your rights and benefits under this campaign are personal to you.  You many not transfer or assign any of your rights or benefits under this campaign to any third-party.

varietals Argaman, Carignan and Syrah and is aged for 16 months in French oak
barrels. 
2012: CHADONNAY
Wonderful fruity Chardonnay wine
aged in oak barrels. Sold out.
2012: ROSE
Refreshing Rose with beautiful fruit
aromas and light sweetness from the varietals Argaman and Syrah. Sold out.
The 2013 harvest maintained a
similar line of creativity and innovation with a total production of 52,000
bottles. In this harvest we produced a second batch of our flagship wine and
added two new wines:
2013: BLENDLAVAN
An unorthodox fusion of three white
varietals: Gewürztraminer, Riesling and Chardonnay that together create a fresh
and light white wine filled with floral aromas. 
2013: SWEET
A dessert wine from 100%
Gewürztraminer grapes.



 Legal Stuff: Please review these terms and conditions prior to participating in this campaign: (1)  Jezreel Valley Winery's obligations to you under this campaign shall terminate, without notice, (i) upon the institution by or against you or Jezreel Valley Winery of insolvency, receivership or bankruptcy proceedings or any other proceedings for the settlement of either party’s debts, (ii) upon Jezreel Valley Winery's dissolution or ceasing to do business; or (iii) upon your death; and (2)  Your rights and benefits under this campaign are personal to you.  You many not transfer or assign any of your rights or benefits under this campaign to any third-party.

story:
Gingerbread Lane Confectionery

Will be the most uniquely themed imported candy, chocolate, dessert and other yummy treats shoppe around.  There are so many absolutely incredible goodies and treats from elsewhere in the world that cannot be easily found in the US, while others can't be found at all. Every year we become more and more disappointed by how difficult it is to find these products and then we are disappointed again by the selection of what we do find and often the quality as well.  We are here to change all of that!  We cannot wait to share with you the wonderful tastes from around the world from, what we know will become, your favorite sweet stop.



Why We Need Your Help

The plan is to create not just the most visually unique marketplace but also one where the best, most delicious, imported goodies from around the world can be found all in one place.  For Nicola and I this is every bit a labor of love.  We would love to give you a peak inside our collective mind so you can see what our designs look like but it would be revealing too much too soon.  We want you to be as excited about this project as much as we are so please know that what we have planned is a true delight in every way. Every occasion throughout the year, every individual holiday will have its own unique theme and a collection of accessories specially designed by us.  Every holiday order will be bagged in specially designed holiday sacks. They were our favorites growing up and we know they will absolutely delight you as well no matter your age.

Below are only two of the designs we have chosen for our Christmas and Easter sacks, more are coming. Still working on our Halloween sacks!



**THE BEST UPDATE OF ALL**

RATHER THAN POST THIS IN THE UPDATES SECTION, WE WANT TO PUT IT HERE WHERE EVERYONE WILL SEE IT.  WE HAVE BEEN SO FORTUNATE TO RAISE A LOT OF THE FUNDS WE NEEDED ON OUR OWN AND ARE NOW SO CLOSE TO REACHING OUR PRIMARY GOAL!!! WE ARE SO EXCITED!!

WE WILL BE LAUNCHING OUR ONLINE MARKETPLACE JUST AS WE PLANNED.  OUR PHYSICAL STORE WILL COME AT A LATER DATE, THIS WAY WE CAN FULLY FOCUS ON OUR ONLINE STORE AND PUT ALL OF OUR EFFORTS INTO ARRANGING AND ORGANIZING EVERYTHING EXACTLY THE WAY WE WOULD LIKE IT TO LOOK.

THE FUNDS WE ARE STILL HOPING TO GATHER ARE NEEDED TO BRING IN OUR INITIAL SHIPMENTS FROM TWO MORE INTERNATIONAL DISTRIBUTORS, ONE FROM GREECE AND ONE FROM TURKEY, AND TO HELP WITH THE COSTS OF THEIR IMPORT FEES.  WE HAVE SECURED PRODUCTS FROM TWELVE COUNTRIES SO FAR INCLUDING FINLAND, HUNGARY, ITALY, SOUTH AFRICA, AUSTRIA, FRANCE, DENMARK AND CROATIA.  WE WOULD LOVE TO ADD TURKEY AND GREECE TO THEM AS THEY EACH HAVE THEIR OWN COMPLETELY UNIQUE AND SPECIFIC TASTES THAT DON’T COMPARE TO ANY OTHER. 

APPROXIMATELY $2500 WOULD GO TO THIS EXPENSE, $1,000 IS STILL NEEDED TO FINISH UP OUR INCREDIBLE WEBSITE AND THE REST WOULD GO TO A PR CAMPAIGN TO PROMOTE GINGERBREAD LANE CONFECTIONERY RIGHT AFTER KICKOFF AND RIGHT BEFORE THE HOLIDAY SEASON.  EVERY TIME YOU SEE OUR AD OR COMMERCIAL YOU WILL KNOW THAT YOU HELPED MAKE THIS A REALITY, YOU HELPED MAKE IT POSSIBLE.

CAN WE MAKE THIS HAPPEN? I KNOW WE CAN!   IF WE ALL COME TOGETHER WE CAN MAKE IT HAPPEN IN NO TIME AT ALL! 

PLEASE LOOK AT OUR PERKS, THERE IS SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE. CONTRIBUTE WHAT YOU CAN OR LIKE, EVERY BIT IS TRULY APPRECIATED.  




We would love for all of you to become our regular customers as well so we can continue to reward your kindness with new creations and holiday treats for you and your children to love and remember as one of the favorite things about the holidays and every other special occasion in between, the way we remember ours.

Please watch our video and let us know your thoughts, what you think about our ideas and above all please send us any special requests you may have!  Please check us out on Facebook, LIKE OUR PAGE, follow us on Twitter and help spread the word.  Nicola and I are forever grateful to all of you.  Thank you!!

story:
Come one, come all to celebrate the Fourth of July in true Federal Hill style! This year we are going online once again to help fund the parade and street party in addition to the support from our generous sponsors. No donation is too small!

As usual, we will gather on the 800 block of William Street at 10am on Friday, July 4th and everyone is invited to march in the parade. Decorate your bike, stroller, or wagon! Design a float! And then join us afterwards for the National Anthem, a hoola-hoop contest, egg & spoon race, water balloon toss, and limbo! Prizes for all.

Our goal is to cover the costs for the parade and party - including the Fort McHenry Fife & Drum Corps, hula hoopers, a stilt walker, balloon animals, and Miss Twist ice cream.

As usual, we will gather on the 800 block of William Street at 10am on Friday, July 4th and everyone is invited to march in the parade. Decorate your bike, stroller, or wagon! Design a float! And then join us afterwards for the National Anthem, a hoola-hoop contest, egg & spoon race, water balloon toss, and limbo! Prizes for all.
Our goal is to cover the costs for the parade and party - including the Fort McHenry Fife & Drum Corps, hula hoopers, a stilt walker, balloon animals, and Miss Twist ice cream.

story:
Ruth is the single mother of a beautiful three year old boy named Nihon, a housecleaner, prisoner rights advocate, a survivor active in the movement to end gender-based violence, and a caring friend.

Over the past few years, the roof of Ruth's house has been deteriorating, and now the situation is becoming a crisis.  Water is pouring into the house and causing damage. She has applied to multiple city programs and for loans to make the necessary repairs but keeps being denied due to student debt.

Having this house has meant everything to Ruth.  It has enabled her to care for her son and enjoy a level of independence in a way that would otherwise never have been possible.  It is difficult to express the magnitude of what being able to stay and care for their home will mean to Ruth, her son, and their future.

The new roof will cost $6,000. A family member is able to loan her half of the money but she still needs $3,000 to make the new roof a reality. Thank you so much for reading this and remember that even a small gift will be so meaningful. Even if you can't give, please help spread the word!

story:
what you win!


Our Goal

We are looking for 15,000$ funding before end of February 2014. Thanks to this money from day one we are going to impact life of youths and women in Ntui region in Cameroun. Sooner in 2 years time we will be able to produce 100 ton and divide by 4 Banana-Plantains price and bring it to 0.25$/Kg.  We will set a trading platform with the world to allow women from village to get paid thanks to the crafting style work they are doing using banana-plantain by products.

Our Mission

Bring Banana-Plantains on the table for family living with 2$/days

From plantain-Banana to a Work of Art

Thanks to Plantain-banana trading peasants can send their children to school and Thanks to its fruit; women insure their family covers at least ¼ of their energetic food needs.

Plantain-banana might give a unique opportunity to Africa in particular to Cameroon to feed its children and to reach food safety. In a village called Ntui (Located in the center region of Yaoundé) where Plantain-banana is grown, leaves are used to make surprising things such as shoes, bags and wonderful work of art. Nevertheless today we are facing a real and imminent danger. The production deficit is reaching unprecedented number such as 1 million tons per year which is equivalent to the consumption of 5 millions of people per year

How it works:

Our vision is to set up a social company to farm banana-plantain and to recycle its waste (leaves and tree trunk) into decorative objects.

Our model is simple: By selling Banana-Plantain work of art in to regional and international market we will be able to bring out value on something usually considered as waste. Thanks to this added value we can lower our banana-plantain production cost, thus we can produce a banana plantain at a cost available for family living with almost 2$ per day

Empowering young people to get self employed using thier land

Located in central Africa border by Atlantic Ocean with beautiful beaches such as Limbé or Kribi, Cameroon is known as a wonderful diverse country in term of culture nevertheless its agricultural capacities remain unexploited and far below from what it should be.

In Ntui region we want to give back work to young people and allow women to feed their family. Fund this project is contributed to a sustainable development where women and youths from this village will create their own jobs using the most valuable legacy they have which is their land!

Starchy Food Number 1

Here you can see how banana-plantain is used in Cameroon. It is currently the 3rd starchy food and government is pushing to bring it number one to replace rice as Cameroon has the full capacity thanks to produce it for the country and for minimum 4 neighbors its lands and to its farmers who need to be trained on how to cultivate banana-plantain.

Do you know it takes 14 months!

From the time you put seeds in the ground to the time you can harvest it takes 14 months. From day one you have to take care and make sure you have enough water, sun, nutrient to feed the plant and protect while it is growing


Not just peasants but also Craftsmen:

The works of art below are all generated from banana plantain

1.  Banana plantain is harvested from tree plant

2.  The leaves are dried and the best one are selected to be used

3.  Women can now show they crafting style

Our Story

We started this project 2 years ago using our money to finance the project while doing jobs at University school.

As Africans we studied Engineering and Business in France an Germany. We had the choice between starting our career where we studied or go back to our country to bring our contribution to its development. We knew our country was capable to feed its population but no plan was really in place to tackle problem. We decide it was the tome to bring changes and started the project 2 years with the objective to contribute to end hunger and provide work to people. Thanks to the help of people living in village we acquired land necessary to kick the project; we got our team to be trained to understand how Banana- Plantain  plant grows and how to develop the project in respect of our environment.

At this time we complete the 1st phase which was preparation of the land, preparation of the seed and started the 1st seeding. We need now to start the 2nd phase which is alike the 1st phase and here you come. By helping us in this second phase you help us to change families daily life. 

what your purchase will do

this Projects so far was financed by owners and villagers it needs today a final kick from you to become a changing life reality

story:
All Dogs Are Welcome

This is the business I am hoping to start with your help:

A self-service dog wash in the center of Bellingham that offers more than a wham-bam thank you dunk for your dog. At Shake & Shine you will be able to take care of all around self-service grooming with the active support of our staff. Our dog care supplies and treats are healthy, non-toxic, and environmentally friendly. Our store will be clean and welcoming!

My name is Monika Lange and I am a biologist and dog owner with a life-long passion for animals and pets. I have volunteered at the Seattle Zoo and am now washing dogs at the Whatcom Humane Society Shelter. My dog Fitz and I enjoy K9 Nosework together, through which we met many wonderful dog people in Bellingham.

I have been carefully planning, researching, and learning everything I can about the industry, coat and skin care, and the best products. I am ready to go and I am asking your help with closing a funding gap for the build-out of the store!  

Starting a Brick and Mortar Store is Expensive

I am building  this business from the ground up and I am excited to help grow the community. But at this point I need your support! To help with the start-up costs, I need $3,000 — namely for the plumbing and installation of the dog tubs. These tubs are specially build so that dogs only have to walk up a couple of steps to enter the tubs. We are going to build demi-walls between the tubs for privacy and reduced stress. And of course I want to create a welcoming and fun place to hang out. 

These are the kind of tubs I will install:

The dog washes will come with a variety of shampoos and conditioners depending on the coat and skin conditions of your dog. We'll provide towels, brushes, nail clippers and strong pet dryers. There will be two grooming tables with electrical clippers, shears, brushes, and combs for self-service grooming. If you would like to learn more about grooming, we will have group classes about grooming and fun things like pet photography and doggie Halloween costumes.

And every dog deserves a treat after the bath! Shake & Shine will have a great selection of delicious and healthy treats - cookies, packaged, and bulk.

Other things you will be able to find at the store are shampoos and grooming equipment, collars and leashes, non-toxic flea treatments and more.

To make this all possible we are turning to our supporters and future customers! I have several great perks available to you — get a taste of Shake & Shine before we even open!

The Perks

I have a selection of perks to show my gratitude for contributions at all levels. Whether you can give $5 or more, I can't wait to see you at Shake & Shine! All perks are outlined below. They will be available to pick up in the shop or we will ship to you if you are outside of the Bellingham area. Perks like the t-shirt or the hook and towel will be ready before the shop opens. In any case, I am planning to send out postcards as confirmation for your contribution. 

Shake & Shine Washes

If you want a regular wash or all bells and whistles, get one or more washes at a special campaign price! Be the first through the door to try the new tubs, good shampoos and conditioners, fluffy towels, and professional pet dryers. 

Cookies!

It is hard to resist cookies - it doesn't matter if you are a dog or human. Linda's cookies are not quiet ready to go, but I am adding cookies from MaSnax to the perks. 

Shake & Shine T-Shirts

I hope you agree: the shaking dog logo makes really cute T-shirts! There are two colors to choose from and two cuts. One is a straight cut, the other a women's cut. Please specify color, cut, and size.

        

Wipe Your Paws

Do you have a dog station at your door? This perk includes the perfect hook and a nice cotton towel (hand-towel size), so you are always ready to wipe off muddy paws when you come home.                 

 

Mix It

The perks are a mix and match of washes, cookies, t-shirts, and dog stations - hopefully there is something there that will interest you!

Thank You!   

 

Thank you simply for your interest and reading this far, and thank you, thank you, thank you if you were able to contribute! I believe that the store will provide great services to the Bellingham dog community and will be a happy place to visit for people and dogs. 

I know not everyone can contribute to the campaign, but you can still help! Help us get the word out and share this campaign with your friends! Sign up to be on our email list for all the latest and greatest news by emailing me at monika@shake-and-shine.com.

More Thank Yous!

This feels like the Oscars, but without the help of my family and friends I would never have gotten this far! Thank you to everyone who advised me, kept me sane, and supported this project in tangible and intangible form. You know who you are!

story:
Hi, Bell Here!

I'm sure all of you may know that on May 13th I will be flying myself and my little family out to Texas for a whole week of fun! I'm really excited for our adventure and I want them to get the most out of my home as possible.

      I have already purchased the plane tickets, gotten a hotel, and reserved a rental car for this trip. We've been given a suitcase, and have lots of fun things for the BB to play with in the car and on the plane so he doesn't get stir crazy!

      We had an unexpected tax bill come in for Socrates, that we obviously couldn't avoid paying, and it took the money that we were going to use for the trip, plus money out of our Move to Texas fund. Its been hard, but with your generous help, I will still be able to show my family why my home is perfect for us.

In June, I will have been away from my home for 6 years. It hurts to think about all the time I've missed with my loved ones. My son wasn't born on Texas red clay as I was and how I wanted him to be so dearly. My husband has yet to touch a bluebonnet, or to look over the rolling hills into the woods that made me who I am.

      With this, I plan on driving them around the Great Piney Woods, showing them where I grew up and planted my roots. I will take them to great southern restaurants that have been in East Texas for generations, and share the love of southern food with them. I will take them to a bonafide farmers market and let them see what the soil here can create. I will be driving around East Texas, introducing my Husband and son to the family I grew up with and finally after all this time, receive the blessings. We also plan on looking for an area that we want to settle down into, and make a home for ourselves while we are there.

I need at least $600 to make this trip into a beautiful memory and to show them what home really is. This money is going to cover the car deposit, gas, food, and fun. 

EVERY SINGLE DONATION WILL GET A PRIZE. It doesn't matter if its a penny, or $1,000. All of you will receive a base prize of a two minute video, and two pictures made specifically for you. In order to get your base prize, you must put your email down so I can give it to you. There are also going to be prize brackets so you can choose one and get that, as well as the base prize too.

We did this once before with helping me to move from one apartment to another, and it worked really well. I was so impressed by the amount of love I was shown. Thank you for everything, for reading, for donating, for sharing. Thank you. 

If you can't donate...

please take 10 seconds and share this. I will be forever grateful and it would mean the world to me. Share everyday, the more people that see this, the more that can help.

story:
SNORO, c'est quoi ?

Séduit par le design, l'architecture et la récupération, j'ai récemment décidé de créer une compagnie qui vise à redonner une nouvelle vie à une foule de bidules défraîchis. Je désirais fabriquer mes propres oeuvres en transformant et en recyclant les objets du quotidien, et créer des pièces singulières, excentriques, des pièces qui reflètent ma vision de la vie. C'est un peu mon coup de main pour notre chère planète Terre. 

                

                              What is SNORO?

Strongly attracted to design, architecture and recycling, I recently decided to create a company dedicated to repurposing a multitude of previously-used contraptions. In a way, it’s like giving a hand to dear old Mother Earth. I wanted to create my own works of art by transforming and recycling day-to-day objects, and to produce unique and eccentric pieces that reflect my vision of life.



     



                              Pourquoi SNORO ?

Un jour, l'idée m'est venue de créer mon propre « métier amusant » en alliant toutes les choses que j'aimais faire : rénover, créer, recycler, bizouner, bricoler, et surtout, célébrer la différence en suscitant un certain questionnement, en touchant les gens et en les faisant sourire.

La compagnie Snoro est née de ce désir. Espiègle, délurée, astucieuse, elle est encore toute jeune, mais a déjà des idées plein la tête... Suivez-moi dans cette folle aventure!


                                 Why SNORO ?

One day, I had the idea of creating my own “enjoyable trade” by mixing all the things I enjoy doing – renovating, creating, tinkering, puttering about, and celebrating uniqueness. I wanted to make my own works of art by transforming mundane objects and creating singular, eccentric pieces that reflect my vision of life, because I believe that difference creates a sympathetic challenge, a sort of questioning, but mostly that it touches people and makes them smile.

The Snoro Company was born of this desire. Playful, bold, and clever, it is still very young, but its head is overflowing with ideas... Join me in this wild adventure!



       



                            SNORO, c'est qui ? 

SNORO est une jeune compagnie créée par moi, Cbastien Tardif, artiste de cirque et transformateur d'objets. Passionné par l'anticonformisme, l'originalité et les choses inusitées, j'ai eu la chance de cultiver cet enthousiasme dans le domaine des arts du cirque pendant plus de dix-sept ans. Ce tremplin m'a permis de voyager partout dans le monde, où j'ai rencontré des types d'architecture, de design et d'art qui m'ont profondément inspiré. 


                               Who is SNORO? 

Snoro is a young company created by circus performer and object repurposer Cbastien Tardif. (That’s me!)

Passionate about non-conformity, originality and unusual things, I have had the great opportunity to cultivate this enthusiasm in the field of circus arts for more than seventeen years. This endeavour allowed me to tour the world, where I was exposed to architectural, design and art styles that deeply inspired me. 

                           


Quelques exemples de transformations originales:

Here are some samples of original transformations:



    Des horloges transformées à partir de disques vinyles recyclés:

                       Repurposed clocks using recycled vinyl records:


                            


                           


 Pour voir tous les modèles d'horloges:

                            To view all clock models:


          CLIQUEZ ICI / CLICK HERE

                           

                           

Une table faite à partir d'une bobine électrique et de tuyaux de plomberie recyclés:

Tables made from recycled electrical spools and plumbing pipes:


           



        Un napperon transformé à partir d'un disque vinyle recyclé:

                 A repurposed placemat using a recycled vinyl record:


                              



         Un rangement pour CD/DVD fait de tuyaux de plomberie:

                              A CD/DVD storage unit using old pipes:




    Des cahiers de notes transformés à partir d'emballages recyclés :

                      Notebooks repurposed using recycled packaging:

       

                                           
  


                             



  Des miroirs et des sous-verre en panneaux de signalisation recyclés: 

                                    Miror and coasters using recycled road signs:                    

                                                            

           


           



        Une horloge faite à partir d'une pochette de disque recyclée:

                            A clock made from a recycled album sleeve:                                       


                                        

          Des chandeliers et des lampes faits de tuyaux de plomberie:

                             Chandeliers and lamps made from old pipes:


                             


                                     

    

    Qu'est-ce que SNORO utilise comme matériaux ?

La plupart des matériaux que j'utilise pour SNORO proviennent de matières recyclées et d'objets parfois désuets récupérés à même la poubelle (les résidus de vieille peau de banane et de café ont été soigneusement éliminés). 

Tous les objets peuvent être transformés, il suffit d'y mettre un peu de temps, de plaisir et d'imagination...                                                    


                What materials does SNORO use?

Most materials used by SNORO come from recycles items, repurposing obsolete objects some of which have sometimes been pulled out of dumpsters – old banana peels and coffee grounds carefully removed. 

Any object can be transformed, it just required a bit of time, playfulness and imagination.

                                               

                                    



                Voici certains matériaux utilisés:

                 Here are some of the materials I use:



Panneaux de signalisation / Road sign:

Avant / Before Snoro :                                    Après / After Snoro:


  =  



Disques vinyles / Vinyl records:

Avant / Before Snoro:                                          Après / After Snoro:


   =   

   


Emballages recyclés / Recycled packaging:

Avant / Before Snoro:                                        Après / After Snoro:


      =   


Bobines / Spools:

Avant / Before Snoro:                                      Après / After Snoro:


       =   

 

                   

      Rien n'est à l'épreuve de Cbastien (SNORO ?).

En plus d'offrir une sélection d'articles courants, je me ferai un plaisir de traiter vos commandes personnelles et vos demandes les plus inusitées. Bref, vos souhaits les plus fous seront exaucés, ka-tching! On raconte que je suis un genre de... génie (et vous aurez droit à plus de trois souhaits, c'est garanti!)


                      Nothing is Cbastien-proof!

In addition to offering a selection of current items, it would be a pleasure to accept your custom orders and your most unusual requests. In essence, your wildest dreams will be realized, ka-tching! Some say I am a sort of… ‘‘Genie'' (But you’ll get more than three wishes, guaranteed!)                                  

                   


               Participez à ce merveilleux projet: 

Tout le monde sait que la pensée magique a ses propres limites, et j'ai besoin de votre aide précieuse ($$$) pour faire avancer SNORO, pour lui permettre de fleurir et de s'épanouir. Un petit (ou gigantesque) don signifie beaucoup pour moi. C'est comme si vous me donniez une grosse accolade pour m'encourager à persévérer et à propulser mes idées vers l'infini... ça c'est loin!

Vos dons serviront à encourager la récupération, la différence, l'originalité... et si on extrapole un peu, à sauver notre planète en péril. 

Concrètement, vos dons serviront à acheter de nouveaux équipements, un camion de transport fermé, à payer les premiers mois de loyer, à rémunérer mes collaborateurs (site web, design, etc.), à faire de la publicité, et bien plus.

On a tous un petit 500 $ qui traîne dans nos poches ou sous notre matelas... hahaha!

Laissez-vous aller, pour que je puisse créer, et vous exaucer.



                     Join this wonderful project:

Everybody knows magical thinking has its own limits, and I need your valuable assistance ($$$) to move Snoro forward, to allow it to bloom and grow. A small donation (or a gigantic one) will mean a lot to me. It’s as though you gave me a big hug to encourage me to persevere and push my idea to infinity… That’s pretty far : )

Your donations will help promote recycling, differentiation and originality… In concrete terms, these donations will help purchase new equipment, buy a delivery van, pay a few months’ rent and my collaborators (website, design, etc.), advertise, and so much more!

We all have $500 or so lying around… Ha! Ha! Ha!

So please give a little so I can create and fulfill your dreams.                   



             

                 Comment participer au projet ?


C'est très facile...

Voici ce que vous avez à faire.

1— Choisissez une contrepartie originale.

2— Cliquez à droite de l'écran sur votre contrepartie préférée.

3— Faites un don pour que SNORO puisse créer.

4— Je reçois votre don et vous recevez une création SNORO.

5 — Vous êtes heureux et je suis heureux :) 

C'est très facile...


               How to participate in the project?


Couldn’t be easier...

Here’s what you have to do.

1- You select an original compensation.

2- You click on the right side of the screen on your favourite compensation.

3- You make a donation so SNORO can create.

4- I receive your donation and you receive a SNORO creation.

5 – You’re happy, and I’m happy : ) 

It’s very easy...       

                                                                             

Voici ce que vous pourriez recevoir en contrepartie de votre généreux don :

Here is what you could receive in compensation for your generous gift:







  •















                                         

                        Questions et réponses :

Est-ce que j'ai besoin d'ajouter une somme additionnelle pour le transport?

Vous pouvez regarder les détails dans chacune des contreparties. Tout est indiqué.

Quand vais-je recevoir ma contrepartie SNORO?

La plupart des contreparties seront livrées avant le 1er novembre 2014. 

Quoi faire si mes questions ne sont pas répondues ici?

Si vous avez des commentaires ou des questions concernant ce projet, n'hésitez pas à m'en faire part. Je serai heureux de vous entendre :)

Envoyez-moi un courriel à cette adresse : info@snoro.ca


                        Questions and answers:

Should I add a little extra for shipping?

Shipping: As far as shipping is concerned, check for details under each compensation; it’s all there.

When will I receive my SNORO compensation?

Most of the compensations will be delivered prior to November 1, 2014. 

What should I do if these don’t answer my questions?

If you have comments or questions about this project, don’t hesitate to contact me. I’ll be happy to listen to you : )

Send me an email at: info@snoro.ca                                                         

                                     

 

                              Merci beaucoup ! 

Je voudrais remercier tout ceux qui ont participé et qui contribueront à rendre ce projet réalisable.  Mille mercis pour votre aide !

S.V.P., partagez avec fougue mon projet à travers Facebook, Twitter, la galaxie, l'infinie !

Merci beaucoup! 


                                Thank you very much! 

I would like to thank all those who took part and will be contributing to making this project happen. A thousand thank-yous for your help!

Please, share my project wildly across Facebook, Twitter... the whole galaxy!

Thank you very much!

Tout le monde sait que la pensée magique a ses propres limites, et j'ai
besoin de votre aide précieuse ($$$) pour faire avancer SNORO, pour lui
permettre de fleurir et de s'épanouir. Un petit (ou gigantesque) don signifie
beaucoup pour moi. C'est comme si vous me donniez une grosse accolade pour
m'encourager à persévérer et à propulser mes idées vers l'infini... ça c'est
loin!
Vos dons serviront à encourager la récupération, la différence,
l'originalité... et si on extrapole un peu, à sauver notre planète en
péril.  
Concrètement, vos dons serviront à acheter de nouveaux équipements,
un camion de transport fermé, à payer les premiers mois de loyer, à rémunérer
mes collaborateurs (site web, design, etc.), à faire de la publicité, et bien
plus.
On a tous un petit 500 $ qui traîne dans nos poches ou sous notre
matelas... hahaha!
Laissez-vous
aller, pour que je puisse créer, et vous exaucer.




                     Join this wonderful project:
Everybody knows magical thinking has its own limits, and I need your
valuable assistance ($$$) to move Snoro forward, to allow it to bloom and grow.
A small donation (or a gigantic one) will mean a lot to me. It’s as though you
gave me a big hug to encourage me to persevere and push my idea to infinity…
That’s pretty far : )
Your donations will help promote recycling, differentiation and
originality… In concrete terms, these donations will help purchase new
equipment, buy a delivery van, pay a few months’ rent and my collaborators
(website, design, etc.), advertise, and so much more!
We all have $500 or so lying around… Ha! Ha! Ha!
So
please give a little so I can create and fulfill your dreams.                   

                              Comment participer au projet ?

C'est très facile...


Voici ce que vous avez à faire.
1— Choisissez une contrepartie originale.
2— Cliquez à droite de l'écran sur votre contrepartie préférée.
3— Faites un don pour que SNORO puisse créer.
4— Je reçois votre don et vous recevez une création SNORO.
5 — Vous êtes heureux et je suis heureux :) 
C'est
très facile...

               How to participate in the project?

Couldn’t be easier...
Here’s what you have to do.
1- You select an original compensation.
2- You click on the right side of the screen on your favourite
compensation.
3- You make a donation so SNORO can create.
4- I receive your donation and you receive a SNORO creation.
5 – You’re happy, and I’m happy : ) 
It’s
very easy...       
                                                                             
Voici ce que vous pourriez recevoir en contrepartie de votre généreux don :




Here is what you could receive in compensation for your generous gift:









































































                                     




                        Questions et réponses :


Est-ce que j'ai besoin d'ajouter une somme additionnelle pour le
transport?
Vous pouvez regarder les détails dans chacune des
contreparties. Tout est indiqué.
Quand vais-je recevoir ma contrepartie SNORO?
La plupart des contreparties seront livrées avant le
1er novembre 2014. 
Quoi faire si mes questions ne sont pas répondues ici?
Si vous avez des commentaires ou des questions concernant ce projet,
n'hésitez pas à m'en faire part. Je serai heureux de vous entendre :)
Envoyez-moi un courriel à cette adresse : info@snoro.ca



                        Questions and answers:
Should I add a little extra for shipping?
Shipping: As far as shipping is concerned, check for details under each
compensation; it’s all there.
When will I receive my SNORO compensation?
Most of the compensations will be delivered prior to November 1, 2014. 
What should I do if these don’t answer my questions?
If you have comments or questions about this project, don’t hesitate to
contact me. I’ll be happy to listen to you : )
Send me an email at: info@snoro.ca                                                         

                                     
 

                              Merci beaucoup ! 
Je voudrais remercier tout ceux qui ont participé et qui contribueront à rendre ce projet réalisable.  Mille mercis pour votre aide !
S.V.P., partagez avec fougue mon projet à travers Facebook, Twitter, la galaxie, l'infinie !


Merci beaucoup! 



                                Thank you very much! 
I would
like to thank all those who took part and will be contributing to making this
project happen. A thousand thank-yous for your help!
Please, share my project wildly across Facebook, Twitter... the whole
galaxy!
Thank you very much!

story:
Short Summary

We are blessed with opportunity, and given the right tools to succeed to benefit in our own lives. Others around the world are not so lucky. What is driving us in this particular venture is to provide opportunity to those kids that have the skill but have little chance to get to where they want and have the potential to be. We are not only doing this just because it’s a good thing to do but because it's the right things to do. We want to help inspire and provide a chance to someone that needs it. We were fortunate to be given that chance from someone in our lives. So in turn…why shouldn’t we pay-it-forward? 

This program has been running successfully for 3 years now. Please help us keep it going. 

By following the link below you will be able to see pictures and video from past trips :)    www.facebook.com/ProjectSolutionJamaica


Where Does The Money Go:

We would like to make it very clear that all money raised during this campaign goes directly into the children's breakfast fund at Granville Primary School located in Trelawny, Jamaica. Any additional funds raised will go towards the scholarship program, where only $1400 can fund one child’s tuition, food and room and board for 1 year. 

An example of just how far your money will go, can be seen in the reviving of the breakfast program: There are approximately 500 children dependent on this program. The breakdown is this: to feed 500 children each morning for one year will only cost approximately $5800! We can make this difference! We've been helping for 3 years now...let's continue to show we care ☺ 

- Lords of Gastown - has generously donated 20 t-shirts to give away as daily prizes. Anyone who donates $25 or more will be entered into a random draw. Winners will be announced nightly and will be contacted directly to collect their shirt.

At the end of the campaign all donators will be entered into a final draw to win a Photoshoot valued at $450 with Natalia Anja Photography. 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Spreading a Little Sunshine

We are a husband and wife team that currently operate a small Fitness Consulting company that helps struggling gyms become financially solvent. We have been given the incredible opportunity to open our own! With this project, we believe we can create a local health club that is accepting and welcoming of everyone. In the gyms that we have managed together over the past 10 years and any that we are involved in for our consulting company, we strive to create an environment much like the old TV show, Cheers! Whenever Norm walks into the bar, everyone yells "Norm!" He is warmly embraced as he strolls into is his home away from home. We want that same atmosphere in our gym when our members walk in to the club, making a decision to improve their health that day. Our 4,000 square foot gym is called Atlas Fit Club, and our slogan is simply this, "Show up. Be awesome." 

Through your help completing the opening of this gym, we are confident that we can make a positive impact on our community! We will be accomplishing the following:

  • Provide kids' fitness and martial arts classes that instill discipline, self confidence and physical fitness in children
  • Teach children how to communicate and stand up for themselves through anti-bullying campaigns
  • Create a welcoming and inspirational environment for people of all walks of life
  • Spread joy through the positive impacts that working out has for individuals, while making it convenient, fun and affordable for all
  • Provide Sunday afternoon classes that offer a 15 Minute Guided Meditation, 45 Minute Workout & 15 Minute Snack/Social time with healthy snacks provided. This is a donation only class, and any amount will be accepted. (Portion goes to the currently featured charity every week.) 

Where we are now!

We  are less than three weeks away from launching our pre-sale, and realizing the vision that we have worked to  make a reality.  The space has been cleaned and repainted, we have most of the equipment in place, and the community is buzzing and excited to know that we are a few weeks away from opening.  However, we need your help to complete the vision and help empower Atlas Fit Club to accomplish all that it is meant to.

  • Atlas Fit Club needs to raise $12,000 to insure that we have enough money to purchase specialty equipment, develop and staff our Kids' Fitness and Martial Arts programs, and have a significant budget for advertising and marketing.  
  • Atlas Fit Club believes in an exchange of energy.  For helping us, we are going to help you make your life happier and healthier.  Our perks are designed to bring health, happiness, and a sense of higher purpose when you support Atlas Fit Club's vision of changing the world one community at a time.
  • The funds that Atlas Fit Club collects will be used to invest in the acquisition of new equipment and staff, develop and market our Kids Fitness and Martial Arts classes, and to insure Atlas Fit Club's success and profitability by effectively advertising in the community.
  • Atlas Fit Club also needs to purchase an illuminated outdoor sign so that we can literally and figuratively be a beacon of light and joy in the community. 

Lives Changed!

We believe in three tenants of health, and each one cannot exist without the other.

  • Physical- Our bodies are our home and the foundation of our minds and soul. It should be as healthy as possible.  Atlas Fit Club will make the community a healthier place.
  • Mental-When the body is healthy, then the mind blossoms and expands.  That is when the world is changed.  Good thoughts equal good place to live.
  • Social- We humans are a family, interrelated and inseparably linked in one way or another. With our members being healthier in both mind and body, Atlas Fit Club will actively cultivate a spirit of gratitude and acceptance that will improve the community as our members see the world in a healthier and more positive light.  
  • In addition, Atlas Fit Club will teach our children and youth that they can be strong enough to handle any challenge, physical or mental, that they encounter.  Atlas Fit Club will emphasize the virtues of structure, discipline, physical fitness, and social poise. Atlas Fit Club will actively advocate an anti-bullying campaign designed to empower students and teach them how to defend themselves when a physical confrontation is the last resort.  
  • As owners, we have built our professional reputations on our ability to improve the community around us.  We know how to create that sense of community and belonging that the world is searching for, and we are fortunate enough to use a medium that allows us to reach people at many different levels.  We have seen people change their own lives by simply getting themselves in to a healthier state of being.
  • The motto of Atlas Fit Club is "SHOW UP. BE AWESOME." We know that the members of Atlas Fit Club  will feel inspired to show up and be as awesome as they want to be. We want to be the "CHEERS" of the community.  We want to be the healthiest of second homes to our neighbors and friends.

Healthy and Happy! Here is where you come in.

If you are feeling inspired, and want to act, there are two ways to help us realize our vision:

  • Direct investment. Choose and enjoy the perk that works best for you. Our perks have been designed to improve the health of your body, your mind, and your soul. Physical fitness, nutritional guidance, some great swag, and a sense of accomplishment is what our perks are all about.
  • Spread the word. If you see our vision, and think its remarkable enough to share, then please do. You can email, text, call or use any social media platform you like.  Of course, a good ole fashioned face-to-face, "Hey, let me tell you about the best gym in the world," kinda story is pretty awesome, too!

story:
Buenos días. Mi nombre es Manuel Alejandro Ruiz y estoy haciendo una campaña para solicitar fondos para cumplir mi sueño de montar una policínica sanitaria. 
 Yo soy nutricionista y me gustaría contar con servicio de nutrición, fisioterapia, podología, psicología, medicina natural, etc. 

Para ello alquilaré un local en zona céntrica de Granada, haré una página web, contrataré publicidad en medios de comunicación y haré reparto de publicidad en papel en mano.
Aparte de atención en consulta de ofrecerá atención Online y domiciliaria, para no limitar los potenciales clientes a los residentes o personas de paso en la zona y poder atender a aquellas personas que por su situación no pudieran desplazarse.

COSTE DEL PROYECTO
Alquiler del primer mes y fianza: 1000€
Licencia de apertura: 500€
Publicidad en medios y en papel: 500€
Página web: 300€
Mobiliario de la consulta (incluyendo rótulo luminoso exterior): 800€
Registro del nombre de la empresa: 130€
Primer mes de autónomo: 70€
Gastos (luz, teléfono, agua, internet,...) iniciales: 200€
En total el coste sería de 3.500€. Yo podría aportar 1.000€ pero al no tener nómina, ningún banco o caja me financia los 2.500€ restantes, pese a no ser una cantidad muy grande.

PUNTOS FUERTES
Actualmente hay una gran preocupación en torno a la salud, lo que sumado a una buena campaña de publicidad, y el darle al cliente la posibilidad de no acudir presencialmente a la consulta y hacerlo vía internet o mediante la presencia del especialista en su domicilio, sería un gran atractivo.
Igualmente la consulta estaría localizada en una zona de tránsito de gente en Granada, en Camino de Ronda, lo que ayuda a la visibilidad.

PUNTOS DÉBILES
Como cualquier negocio que se pretenda iniciar en esta época de crisis, hay una posibilidad de que no funcione.
Para ello he decidido realizar una inversión pequeña, moderando los gastos a lo estrictamente necesario para un correcto funcionamiento.
En caso de que la consulta en local no funcionara, siempre se podría centrar los esfuerzos de expansión en la consulta Online (ahora en auge), de modo que se pudiera seguir adelante con menos gastos.

EN RESUMEN
Esta es mi idea, mi proyecto. Espero que os haya interesado y os anime a colaborar, aunque sea con lo mínimo.
Estaré encantado de resolver todas vuestras dudas y preguntas.

story:
Short Summary

I believe in the power of food to bring people together. I use food as my expression of Love and I would love to share it with you.

Over the years, I’ve gathered more than 50 recipes that bring people together. People from different cultures, religions, nations and neighborhoods have become friends and family at my dinner table. With these recipes, they connect on a personal level, opening their hearts and love to each other to enjoy Afro-Fusion meals together. I would love to share these recipes with you.

Hello, to every foodie out there who regularly pushes the boundaries of their food comfort zone. My name is Yetunde Taiwo and I love life and have a deep and passionate love affair with food, especially African food. So I'm creating the Afropolitan Chef Cookbook to share the techniques, flavors and spices of the world inspired by Africa. The concept is to share with you the eating habits of the modern day Cosmopolitan African. I have been cooking since I was 6 years old and my mother is my greatest influence in the kitchen. Afropolitan Chef dishes are tasty, save time and are visually enticing. I am calling your attention today because I need your support in making this delicious dream come true. 


You will learn and discover 3 main things in this book:

  • How to cook healthy delicious African inspired meal
  • How to save time in the kitchen and still eat 5 star style in your own home.
  • How to present the food so that you enjoy the food experience from hunger to the last bite.
  • And finally the pure joy of tapping into the power of food to bring people together.



    About the Book

    The Afropolitan Chef cookbook will have over 50 savory recipes in time for Thanksgiving 2014. The recipes are a fusion of meals I have learned over the years, influenced by West Africa, and includes something not usually shared in African fusion meals: A Calorie Count. Yes, delicious, exotic and still healthy! I have also done my best to include ingredients that you can get at any local grocery store.

    I have already written most of the recipes and shot the photos to go in the cookbook. In order to have foodies flipping through the pictures, salivating and yearning to satisfy their pallets in time for Thanksgiving; I need to raise $7,500 before summer's end. So far, The Afropolitan Chef has already been featured in the following media:

    • CBS Miami
    • Applause Magazine
    • Bella Naija and New African Woman Magazine


    The Impact

    Your support of this project will help:

    • Provide a high quality African Inspired cookbook for the world to experience
    • The calorie count in each meal can help you come up with an effective diet plan as you still enjoy eating what you would love to eat.
    • Teach foodies how to cook quick, colorful, flavorful, healthy African meals.
    • Support the World Food Program and No Kids Hungry non-profit organizations.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If funds pose a challenge financially for you but you still want to be able to support this campaign, here is how you can help:

    • Use the Indiegogo share tool and tell your family and friends about this campaign
    • Follow Afropolitan Chef on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/AfropolitanChef
    • Follow Afropolitan Chef of facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Afropolitanchef

    And that's all there is to it.


    What your support covers

    Printing the full color keepsake that will be a suitable gift for the foodies in your life. I want our readers to feel lust at first sight. And since this will represent a part of Africa, it is important to me that it is a top quality cookbook.

    The goal of $7,500 will cover:  

    • Professional full color printed copies of the cookbook 7 x 9.5 (3 ring binder with over 120 pages of goodness)

    •  An ISBN Number

    • E-book creation and conversion

    •  Afropolitan Chef Aprons

    • Indiegogo, Paypal and charges (5-9% of funds raised)

    • Shipping of cookbooks and gifts to you



    About Me

    I am a Chicago-born, Nigeria-raised serial entrepreneur and proprietor of ICY PR. And I am a notorious food lover. With the help of my mother and my dear friends, I have spent the last 4 years developing the Afropolitan Chef brand. I write a food column exclusively for New African Woman to share some recipes and thanks to M3 Studios in Miami, we shot a show demo and a pilot, for an Afropolitan Chef cooking show. Oh! The possibilities

    When the idea of this cookbook came to me, I made a promise to God that 10% of each print book sale for the rest of my life would go to The World Food Program and No Kids Hungry organizations. So when you purchase a book, you also get a chance to change the world with food. It is my wish that no child or people in need will ever be left hungry. In Africa or anywhere and Afropolitan Chef, is part of my life-long commitment to feeding and teaching food to those in need.

    Thank you for taking the time to read this, I hope you take the next step and support this delicious dream.



     You can watch the show demo here

    Bit.ly/AfropolitanChefDEMO

    You can read more about the Afropolitan Chef Dinning Society Here

    http://www.afropolitanchef.com/dining-society/


    CLICK HERE TO WATCH THE PILOT EPISODE
    Bit.ly/AfropolitanChefPILOT

    Let’s make African Fusion meals a part of our kitchens all over the world.

    With Love and Sincerity,

    Yetunde Taiwo

    www.afropolitanchef.com
story_txt:
Short SummaryI believe in the power of food to bring people together. I use food as my expression of Love and I would love to share it with you.Over the years, I’ve gathered more than 50 recipes that bring people together. People from different cultures, religions, nations and neighborhoods have become friends and family at my dinner table. With these recipes, they connect on a personal level, opening their hearts and love to each other to enjoy Afro-Fusion meals together. I would love to share these recipes with you. 
Hello, to every foodie out there who regularly pushes the boundaries
of their food comfort zone. My name is Yetunde Taiwo and I love life and have a
deep and passionate love affair with food, especially African food. So I'm
creating the Afropolitan Chef Cookbook to share the techniques, flavors and
spices of the world inspired by Africa. The concept is to share with you the
eating habits of the modern day Cosmopolitan African. I have been cooking since
I was 6 years old and my mother is my greatest influence in the kitchen. Afropolitan Chef
dishes are tasty, save time and are visually enticing. I am calling your
attention today because I need your support in making this delicious dream come
true.  You will learn and discover 3 main things in this book:
 
How to cook healthy delicious African inspired meal How to save time in the kitchen and still eat 5 star style in your own home.
 How to present the food so that you enjoy the food experience from hunger to the last bite.
And finally the pure joy of tapping into the power of food to bring people together.

  About the Book
 
The Afropolitan Chef cookbook will have over 50 savory recipes in
time for Thanksgiving 2014. The recipes are a fusion of meals I have learned
over the years, influenced by West Africa, and includes something not usually
shared in African fusion meals: A Calorie Count. Yes, delicious, exotic and
still healthy! I have also done my best to include ingredients that you can get
at any local grocery store.
I have already written most of the recipes and shot the photos to go
in the cookbook. In order to have foodies flipping through the pictures,
salivating and yearning to satisfy their pallets in time for Thanksgiving; I
need to raise $7,500 before summer's end. So far, The Afropolitan Chef has
already been featured in the following media:
 
CBS Miami Applause Magazine
 Bella Naija and New African Woman Magazine


  The Impact Your support of this project will help: 
Provide a high quality African Inspired cookbook for the world to experience
The calorie count in each meal can help you come up with an effective diet plan as you still enjoy eating what you would love to eat.
 Teach foodies how to cook quick, colorful, flavorful, healthy African meals. Support the World Food Program and No Kids Hungry non-profit organizations.     Other Ways You Can Help If funds pose a challenge financially for you but you still want to be able to support this campaign, here is how you can help: 
Use the Indiegogo share tool and tell your family and friends about this campaign

Follow Afropolitan Chef on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/AfropolitanChef
 Follow Afropolitan Chef of facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Afropolitanchef
  And that's all there is to it.What your support covers
 
Printing the full color keepsake that will be a suitable gift for
the foodies in your life. I want our readers to feel lust at first sight. And
since this will represent a part of Africa, it is important to me that it is a
top quality cookbook.
The goal of $7,500 will cover:  
 

Professional full color printed copies of the cookbook 7 x 9.5 (3
ring binder with over 120 pages of goodness)


 An ISBN Number


E-book creation and conversion


 Afropolitan Chef Aprons


Indiegogo, Paypal and charges (5-9% of funds raised)



Shipping of cookbooks and gifts to you




About Me
I am a Chicago-born, Nigeria-raised serial entrepreneur and
proprietor of ICY PR. And I am a notorious food lover. With the help of my
mother and my dear friends, I have spent the last 4 years developing the
Afropolitan Chef brand. I write a food column exclusively for New African Woman
to share some recipes and thanks to M3 Studios in Miami, we shot a show demo and a
pilot, for an Afropolitan Chef cooking show. Oh! The possibilitiesWhen the idea of this cookbook came to me, I made a promise to God
that 10% of each print book sale for the rest of my life would go to The World
Food Program and No Kids Hungry organizations. So when you purchase a book, you
also get a chance to change the world with food. It is my wish that no child or
people in need will ever be left hungry. In Africa or anywhere and Afropolitan
Chef, is part of my life-long commitment to feeding and teaching food to those
in need.
Thank you for taking the time to read this, I hope you take the next
step and support this delicious dream.
 You can watch the show demo here
Bit.ly/AfropolitanChefDEMO
You can read more about the Afropolitan Chef Dinning Society Here
http://www.afropolitanchef.com/dining-society/ CLICK HERE TO WATCH THE PILOT EPISODE Bit.ly/AfropolitanChefPILOT 
Let’s make African Fusion meals a part of our kitchens all over the
world.
With Love and Sincerity,
Yetunde Taiwowww.afropolitanchef.com

story:
Who We Are

Alex (from San Diego, CA) and Jamily (from Fortaleza, Ceara) met in Barcelona backpacking through Europe four years ago. Three years later, the stars realigned and they met again in San Francisco.  After six months of living there together, they left on a journey through South America together.  We went to another hostel and met the Bartender, a burly American by the name of Shain (from Portland, Oregon).

 
He jumped at the idea of opening up a hostel someday with us. And so the legend begins.

  
Some weeks later a little Australian name Clae (from Melbourne, Australia) appeared in a hostel we were at in Rio De Janeiro. 
We rented an apartment with him in Lapa for a week, and he expressed interest in starting a hostel as well.  It was at that point Jamily and Alex decided to make their dreams come true.  Many months, challenges, and battles have been fought, but now all are reunited to commence the next chapters of their lives.

Backpackers in Paradise

We are creating the Full Sail Hostel.  We were inspired to make this project after visiting many hostels around the world, and we wanted to bring all the best parts of our favorite hostels to a place which lacks the backpacking atmosphere.  We love this city for its lively music culture. We love it for its beaches.  We love it for its authenticity.  It really does feel like home, and we want to invite you to share in the splendor of Fortaleza before you embark on your next adventure, wherever that may be.


Beira-Mar

The true backpacker experience is not only about places and things to see, but the people you would never have met otherwise.  Everyone who helped to create this project met on the road in different places around the world, and are coming from as far away as Australia to help make it a possibility.  Our hostel focuses on travelers, sharing experiences, music, art, and comfort.  We have noticed that few hostels in this city focus on the travelers specifically, but this is all we want to do. We want to hear your music! We want you to paint our walls with your style of art! We want you to share your story with people around the world! And we want you to do it in our house.

Fortaleza is a paradise;  it is surrounded by warm, blue ocean on all sides, it is in close proximity to some of the most beautiful beaches in the world (we're looking at you, Jericoacoara), and is rich with Brazilian culture that is largely undiscovered by the rest of the world.  The city lacks in hostels that cater to the backpackers needs (for example, some places do not even offer toilet paper.) But we plan on changing that by being the first real hostel in the city. We will feature a hostel only bar/lounge so guests can relax, an in house travel agent who can help organize anything from learning kite/wind-surf to buying bus or plane tickets to anywhere around the world, organized activities for those who wish to see the sights and learn the history, nightlife activities for the night owls, and a safe and secure place to call their home for the duration of their stay.

The street that you walk down to go to the beach. Our house is located right next to this road, and it only takes 5 minutes to get to the beach.

What We Need

In finding a house in the best possible location in Fortaleza, we have had to spend most of our budget on renovating the house to meet our high standards.  The pledged amount will allow us to budget in AC, better beds, appliances, better speakers, and other luxuries we just cant afford due to the high renovation costs.  It will also be used for funding art projects such as buying paint supplies for artists, helping to keep them alive with room and board, and live local music acts to share in the local music culture, 


We want to be the best hostel in Fortaleza, and we strive to become the best in Brazil.  Our dream has always been to travel, but when we are not traveling, we want the travelers to visit us. 

We want to meet the people personally who helped make our dreams come true. If possible, we personally want to meet everyone who donates to our cause.  We encourage you all to keep in touch with us on our website and we will keep you informed of our progress.


Goals

We are attempting to create an international atmosphere in a beautiful place! There are not many of those that exist in this city, even though its beauty is astonishing. Help us create an environment that travelers/backpackers would want to visit in a largely undiscovered place!

We plan on branching out into the community as soon as we can, providing English lessons to children from the favelas (aka slums) so that they can increase their chances to experience the rest of the world outside of Fortaleza.  Not everyone gets the chance to explore the world, but we want to put in our part to help lesser fortunate children explore and experience something outside Fortaleza and improve their chance at a better life.

Challenge Accepted 

Our project is only at risk if people stop coming! But that won't happen. The challenges we face are high renovation costs and spreading our name. All we need is a boost to the finish, and our hostels personality will insure that we remain players in this game.
We went in full sail on this project (yes punny) but have no way, or want, to go back. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our project.  We are not only just a hostel, but a place to share music and art internationally.  A safe haven for people traveling to Fortaleza.  We are run by people who want to be with other people.  We want to help the community.  If all you can do is spread the word, we appreciate it fully.  We cannot succeed without having other people help spread the word along the way.

There are plenty of Indiegogo share tools to help you to help us, please use them!
