story:
Introduction

SanSPEC aims to eliminate hospital acquired infections (HAI) and hand borne infections (HBI) by monitoring and tracking the hand sanitation process for Health Care, Food Manufacturing, Food Service and other professionals required to sanitize to mitigate the spread of HAI/HBI's.

Is your Health and Security Important?

 

How about your children, grand children, great grand children, loved ones, significant others, neighbors, friends?

We are a group of professionals working to reduce the spread of HAI/HBI’s in hospitals, medical centers and food handling sites in the United States and around the world; however our goal is the detection of these killer germs by completing existing detection technology which will lead to eradication of HAI/HBI's in most cases. Carbapenem-Resistant Enterobacteriaceae (CRE) has been identified in 42 states as seen on NBC Nightly News. From the CDC, Some CRE bacteria have become resistant to almost all available antibiotics and can be deadly—one report cites they can contribute to death in up to 50% of patients who become infected. In the 42 states 11% of the hospital fatalities are caused by these pharmacologically resistant bacteria.

By these statements, help in solving this problem is needed urgently. It is difficult for the CDC to ask for the help as it can cause concern, even panic, within the public.

We have researched current offerings and created a solution that can greatly reduce the spread with a technological solution that reminds and tracks the process of hand sanitation which will greatly reduce hand borne contamination. The technology is available and we have a proven track record, the experience and skill sets to make this real. We will integrate detection sensor technology when reliable testing of pilot programs are completed.

After meeting with high level management at large health care facilities around the USA, the #1 show stopper to buying into and implementing a solution was that it needs to be reliable into the high 90% range. They have implemented currently available HAI/HBI prevention procedures and are looking to us to complete our solution to greatly enhance what they have begun.

The lawsuits from HAI/HBI's cost all of us, as these costs get passed on. What is the cost of loss of your life or a loved one’s life?

We have known that this was a possibility and now it is a reality. Where is the solution? Are you or your loved ones an acceptable loss? This is a war that needs to be won quickly! What is the economic impact when there is a 50% death rate due to infection in the general public?

It is a terrible situation when you or a loved one survives a simple or catastrophic illness only to lose a battle for life to a hand borne infection!

Our challenge is that we used our resources to identify the problem and began building the solution. The financial cost is greater than what we have available to complete testing and implementing the solution.

All donations are important to win this battle. If we can afford to purchase a Mega Million or Powerball lottery ticket for a chance to have a dream come true? Wouldn’t winning this lottery be a bigger dream come true?

We have been successful in all endeavors we were associated with to the level we were allowed to be successful at. This is too important to be held back from providing a reliable solution. There are other avenues to funding and they take incredible amounts of time and resources to get there. We believe we have a limited amount of time before the general public would begin to be infected, and that is not acceptable to us nor would it be to you!

We will provide progress reports via social media for all to see. The bigger the voice, the greater ability to have accountability! By donating, you are stating that providing the solution and displaying this information to the world, that the HAI/HBI issue is important to you and there is a need to solve it now!

Our only deterrent will be if we do not meet our fund raising goal. If everyone gives something we can beat this together. This is about saving lives which is the ultimate Return on Investment (ROI)!

9/11 happened because we didn’t have the technology, and the procedures weren’t in place. We didn’t listen to people who brought information to the attention of the powers that be.

The opportunity to curtail and reduce this threat is here now. We need your help in winning this battle!

This is about providing first responder, medical providers, and all of us a safe and secure environment to heal and survive in.

SanSPEC will be a hardware/software solution to monitor and track hand sanitation for healthcare, first responders, food preparation and other industries. It will provide the ability to know who is meeting hand sanitation requirements and who is not within the workplace.

Thank you for trusting and believing in us!

SanSPEC is a product and system for the Worlds People!  Please watch the entire video!  The name stands for:

Sanitation technology
Sanitize
Prevent
Eradicate
Control

With Antibiotic Resistance Infections spreading like wildfire the experts say “the only way to control these infections is by prevention” and that is why we are raising funds to prevent these infections.  Not only will the SanSPEC system assure that health care and the food industry is required to sanitize before touching a patient or food, it will provide an audit trail proving that the process was done correctly!

                

Apps for smartphones and tablets as well as visual and audible indicators will be available for the end users.

Through the use of technology and education, a standard operating procedure will be put in place to track the process.  The SanSPEC system will compile records of “Good” or “Bad” hand sanitation practices which will provide a solution to better educate personnel on the importance of stopping these “Killer Bugs”! We are also developing devices to “Detect and Eradicate” these infections through technology.

The interview of the “Survivor” was not with a doctor or sales person.  The “Survivor” is a well respected technologist in the Public Safety and Security field.

Our team has over a 100 years of experience in asset tracking, communications, security, computer science and chemistry which we have combined to create the SanSPEC system in order to save lives!

Be a Hero, Save a Hero!  Please Contribute for a Solution! 

Who We Are.

 

 

We began as proponets of the Internet of Things as a group in 2005. We implemented epc Gen 2 RFID and integrated this technology with muliple sensor devices. Projects we sucessfully completed are Facial Recognition associated to an ID badge, Asset Management systems (Automated server/personel associated tracking in data centers validation, RFID enabled plastic pallet manufacturing validation and tracking of pallets at the world's largest food and beverage manufactures). We also implemented Counter-Terrorism C.B.R.N.E. (Chemical, Biological,Radiation,Nuclear,Explosives) detection systems, and our scientific background aided in the deployment and concept of operation of these system.

Our extensive Safety and Security expertise spans over 125 years as a group.  We have designed and built Homeland Security, TSA (Transportation Security Administration), CBP (Customs Boarder Patrol) and ICE (Immigration Customs Enforcement) projects succesfully as well as protecting major cities around the USA and the World with leading edge sensor technology to defend against terrorism.

Prior to this, our team members worked to build the broadband networks that carry Voice, Data, and Video for the internet at the Telco's. We implemented wired and wireless Voice, Data, and Video networks and devices for Fortune 500 companies, VA hospitals, and healthcare facilities for over 3 decades! 

We have built and implemented security and supply chain solutions that manage tracking of millions of assets reliably for Government Entities and Fortune 500 companies. We know the importance of the web and social media as we contributed to building broadband networks, software/hardware solutions, and Patent applications of new technology. We have always worked hard to be ahead of the curve and at the forefront of technology and solutions throughout out our lives and careers.

The difference with us is that we are more focused on building networks and solutions that work.

Visit our facebook page for more detail about us.

Your contribution will be your voice! "We the People", say this is important that this problem needs to be solved! 

Visit the Gallery tab above for more information! There is a page to links on the Internet. Click the Facebook/Twitter links for greater detail about us.
story_txt:
Introduction
SanSPEC aims to eliminate hospital acquired infections (HAI) and hand borne infections (HBI) by monitoring and tracking the hand sanitation process for Health Care, Food Manufacturing, Food Service and other professionals required to sanitize to mitigate the spread of HAI/HBI's.
Is your Health and Security Important?
 
How about your children, grand children, great grand children, loved ones, significant others, neighbors, friends?
We are a group of professionals working to reduce the spread of HAI/HBI’s in hospitals, medical centers and food handling sites in the United States and around the world; however our goal is the detection of these killer germs by completing existing detection technology which will lead to eradication of HAI/HBI's in most cases. Carbapenem-Resistant Enterobacteriaceae (CRE) has been identified in 42 states as seen on NBC Nightly News. From the CDC, Some CRE bacteria have become resistant to almost all available antibiotics and can be deadly—one report cites they can contribute to death in up to 50% of patients who become infected. In the 42 states 11% of the hospital fatalities are caused by these pharmacologically resistant bacteria.
By these statements, help in solving this problem is needed urgently. It is difficult for the CDC to ask for the help as it can cause concern, even panic, within the public.
We have researched current offerings and created a solution that can greatly reduce the spread with a technological solution that reminds and tracks the process of hand sanitation which will greatly reduce hand borne contamination. The technology is available and we have a proven track record, the experience and skill sets to make this real. We will integrate detection sensor technology when reliable testing of pilot programs are completed.
After meeting with high level management at large health care facilities around the USA, the #1 show stopper to buying into and implementing a solution was that it needs to be reliable into the high 90% range. They have implemented currently available HAI/HBI prevention procedures and are looking to us to complete our solution to greatly enhance what they have begun.
The lawsuits from HAI/HBI's cost all of us, as these costs get passed on. What is the cost of loss of your life or a loved one’s life?
We have known that this was a possibility and now it is a reality. Where is the solution? Are you or your loved ones an acceptable loss? This is a war that needs to be won quickly! What is the economic impact when there is a 50% death rate due to infection in the general public?
It is a terrible situation when you or a loved one survives a simple or catastrophic illness only to lose a battle for life to a hand borne infection!
Our challenge is that we used our resources to identify the problem and began building the solution. The financial cost is greater than what we have available to complete testing and implementing the solution.
All donations are important to win this battle. If we can afford to purchase a Mega Million or Powerball lottery ticket for a chance to have a dream come true? Wouldn’t winning this lottery be a bigger dream come true?
We have been successful in all endeavors we were associated with to the level we were allowed to be successful at. This is too important to be held back from providing a reliable solution. There are other avenues to funding and they take incredible amounts of time and resources to get there. We believe we have a limited amount of time before the general public would begin to be infected, and that is not acceptable to us nor would it be to you!
We will provide progress reports via social media for all to see. The bigger the voice, the greater ability to have accountability! By donating, you are stating that providing the solution and displaying this information to the world, that the HAI/HBI issue is important to you and there is a need to solve it now!
Our only deterrent will be if we do not meet our fund raising goal. If everyone gives something we can beat this together. This is about saving lives which is the ultimate Return on Investment (ROI)!
9/11 happened because we didn’t have the technology, and the procedures weren’t in place. We didn’t listen to people who brought information to the attention of the powers that be.
The opportunity to curtail and reduce this threat is here now. We need your help in winning this battle!
This is about providing first responder, medical providers, and all of us a safe and secure environment to heal and survive in.

SanSPEC will be a hardware/software solution to monitor and track hand sanitation for healthcare, first responders, food preparation and other industries. It will provide the ability to know who is meeting hand sanitation requirements and who is not within the workplace.
Thank you for trusting and believing in us!

SanSPEC is a product and system for the Worlds People!  Please watch the entire video!  The name stands for:
Sanitation technologySanitizePreventEradicateControl
With Antibiotic Resistance Infections spreading like wildfire the experts say “the only way to control these infections is by prevention” and that is why we are raising funds to prevent these infections.  Not only will the SanSPEC system assure that health care and the food industry is required to sanitize before touching a patient or food, it will provide an audit trail proving that the process was done correctly!
                
Apps for smartphones and tablets as well as visual and audible indicators will be available for the end users.
Through the use of technology and education, a standard operating procedure will be put in place to track the process.  The SanSPEC system will compile records of “Good” or “Bad” hand sanitation practices which will provide a solution to better educate personnel on the importance of stopping these “Killer Bugs”! We are also developing devices to “Detect and Eradicate” these infections through technology.
The interview of the “Survivor” was not with a doctor or sales person.  The “Survivor” is a well respected technologist in the Public Safety and Security field.
Our team has over a 100 years of experience in asset tracking, communications, security, computer science and chemistry which we have combined to create the SanSPEC system in order to save lives!
Be a Hero, Save a Hero!  Please Contribute for a Solution! 
Who We Are.
  
 
We began as proponets of the Internet of Things as a group in 2005. We implemented epc Gen 2 RFID and integrated this technology with muliple sensor devices. Projects we sucessfully completed are Facial Recognition associated to an ID badge, Asset Management systems (Automated server/personel associated tracking in data centers validation, RFID enabled plastic pallet manufacturing validation and tracking of pallets at the world's largest food and beverage manufactures). We also implemented Counter-Terrorism C.B.R.N.E. (Chemical, Biological,Radiation,Nuclear,Explosives) detection systems, and our scientific background aided in the deployment and concept of operation of these system.
Our extensive Safety and Security expertise spans over 125 years as a group.  We have designed and built Homeland Security, TSA (Transportation Security Administration), CBP (Customs Boarder Patrol) and ICE (Immigration Customs Enforcement) projects succesfully as well as protecting major cities around the USA and the World with leading edge sensor technology to defend against terrorism.
Prior to this, our team members worked to build the broadband networks that carry Voice, Data, and Video for the internet at the Telco's. We implemented wired and wireless Voice, Data, and Video networks and devices for Fortune 500 companies, VA hospitals, and healthcare facilities for over 3 decades! 
We have built and implemented security and supply chain solutions that manage tracking of millions of assets reliably for Government Entities and Fortune 500 companies. We know the importance of the web and social media as we contributed to building broadband networks, software/hardware solutions, and Patent applications of new technology. We have always worked hard to be ahead of the curve and at the forefront of technology and solutions throughout out our lives and careers.
The difference with us is that we are more focused on building networks and solutions that work.
Visit our facebook page for more detail about us.
Your contribution will be your voice! "We the People", say this is important that this problem needs to be solved! 
Visit the Gallery tab above for more information! There is a page to links on the Internet. Click the Facebook/Twitter links for greater detail about us.

story:
Imagine that you had to pay for your BREATH and could not afford it.

Eating & breathing are 2 fundamental needs that should be treated as basic human rights.  When a person experiences HUNGER on any level, it compromises aspects of the rest of his or her life.

At ONe TRUe LOVe, it is our mission to feed the heart, mind, & body of EVERY human being, with honor, integrity, & respect, REGARDLESS of one’s ability to afford it. 

We are Ann Cabano & Krysten Aldridge, the Co-Founders of ONe TRUe LOVe, and we would like to give YOU a little bit of history about why we do what we do!

 

 

 

 

 

 

We hit the streets of Phoenix almost 3 years ago with our hearts full of love and our coolers full of sandwiches.  We drove around in our grandma’s RV until we found people who seemed like they could use a hug, and maybe a bite to eat. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This marked the beginning of our grass-roots outreach movement.  Within 3 months, we grew from a team of 8, to OVER 500 volunteers. Each month, we host events & call out to our community for supplies.  We then venture to different parts of Phoenix, where we set up a mobile food & clothing stand, serving awesome healthy food, & giving people an opportunity to ‘shop’ around for clothing.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We quickly recognized that the food & clothing was just one small part of the ‘assignment’ that we have as an outreach group. 

Each time we hit the streets, we hear stories of loss, forgotten greatness, struggle & humble victory... as quickly as we naturally move to ‘fix’ some of the sadness, our biggest gift is to listen & allow these folks a space of dignity.  Many of these individuals have lost their sense of value in the world, & most of them have not been heard or ‘seen‘ in a really long time.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We began to see the ties that hunger, worthiness, & poverty share... we began to see that ANY ONE of US are one decision, one pay-check, or one situation away from being on the street.

We began to see that SOME individuals out there have homes, and STILL have a hard time finding food, so they do what they can to make sure their families can eat. Some of the saddest moments in our lives have been when we reach the end of the line and have to start turning people away because the food is gone. 

NOW, in order to resolve this we decided to open a non-profit breakfast & lunch restaurant with set-donation pricing, and volunteer options for those who cannot afford to pay. 

The ONe TRUe LOVe Kitchen will be a space where the food NEVER runs out, & no one will ever be turned away.

After reaching out to over 6,000 people in need since 2010, we see that the majority of people DO NOT want a hand-out... they want to contribute to their own success, and it is not often that they are given the space to do so. At the ONe TRUe LOVe Kitchen, empowerment is a side dish! We will make sure that everyone discovers his or her unique contribution, ultimately feeling like a part of the family.

What's Happening NOW!

In April, something totally awesome happened for us here at ONe TRUe LOVe... The amazing folks at Adelante Healthcare heard about the magic we were making, and offered us a café space inside of their medical facility in Mesa, Az.  

 

Now, this is especially amazing because ANY successful business has a beta test or a pilot model... Well, the OTL Café at Adelante is exactly that for us! 

Do you want to know what ELSE is amazing about this partnership with Adelante?  Their mission & purpose is totally in alignment with ours. They believe everyone should have access to quality healthcare JUST like we believe everyone should have access to healthy food! So OF COURSE we accepted the offer, and began to birth the ONe TRUe LOVe Café!

This is not just about people who are living on the street anymore... it is about people in need, PERIOD.

THIS is a match made in heaven, and NOW, we NEED YOUR HELP! 

What are we going to do with your contribution?

We have 3 tiers of costs associated with the the pilot café...

Basic Startup Cost: $10,000 -The dollar amount we mention in the film represents this category. This covers initial product, beverage (coffee & tea), & some equipment cost.  This covers bare bones expenses, but it is enough to launch a full coffee & tea bar.

Cloud 4.5 Startup Cost: $20,000 - Our IndieGoGo campaign reflects this amount! (PLUS IGG FEES)  This will cover all of the basic startup cost, a couple months of the recurring costs, beverage, AND beginning food cost. It also includes a point of sale system, 2 ipads, & some basic aesthetic pieces that will allow us to give life to our new space.  We are pretty DYNAMIC individuals, and our Café will totally represent this!  This is enough to launch our coffee & tea bar AND to introduce 6 menu items.

Cloud 9 Startup Cost: $30,000 - Now THIS is the big beefy! This would include the bare-bones startup cost, the POS system, the computers, the aesthetic pieces, menu boards, a neon light, custom OTL retail merchandise, crew member uniforms, & additional equipment that would allow our menu to grow.  

If our $20,000 goal is NOT met on IGG, we are implementing several supplemental strategies in order to insure our success.  This is going to happen regardless of the dollar amount raised- full-funding would just allow us to make an impact sooner!

 

To THANK YOU, we are offering some AWESOME perks!  

From a cyber hug on our website all the way to an IN PERSON visit to YOUR town to help you reach out to YOUR community, OTL style!  We will help you create & host an outreach event & give you all the help you need to develop an outreach team in your area.

Did you SEE that if you donate $1000, you get a personalized song, written & performed by the OTL Crew?  Now THIS is serious stuff here!

You can ALSO be a part of our menu... FOREVER... by naming a menu item!  You can even help us create it if you want!

Crew-member shirts, Travel Mugs, & Aprons are ALL ITEMS that will ONLY be offered for THIS CAMPAIGN! That means that YOU will be sporting RARE merchandise, and most of your friends will be jealous!

How is YOUR donation gonna ROCK the WORLD?

With your help, in the next 2 years, ONe TRUe LOVe will jump from feeding 6,000 people on the street, to OVER 60,000 people in the café.  We have written a WHOLE LOT about WHY we do what we do, so we are going to let our community talk a little more about the impact YOUR donation will make in this world.

Please watch:

Other ways YOU can help!!

 Every $1 makes a difference, & we also have a few more ways you can help out:

  • EMAIL the link to our campaign to anyone you think may be interested!
  • SHARE this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or any other social media sites!
  • Like us on HERE on Facebook!
  • Contact us HERE to volunteer your TIME!

We LOVe each of you with our WHOLE hearts!

- Ann & Krysten 

Also, a BIG shout out to our film maker, Kaard! He is FULLY responsible for the awesomeness caught on tape!  Check him out @ kbombefilms.com!!

story:
As a parent, I’m horrified by yet another senseless killing of our children…now, gone far too soon.

As a philanthropist, I feel that I need to put aside my business needs and help these families in need of our support.

HelpJester has decided to ignore it’s current business goal and give HALF of future funds raised in this fundraiser to those affected by the horrendous attack in Newtown, CT.*

(*excluding American Red Cross and Pancreatic Cancer Action Network PERKS)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have we lost focus of what’s really important? Can we do more? Can we use today’s social media to make a life changing connection and help those in need? I believe we can...and we have in HelpJester!

HelpJester.com is the World's First eMatching Social Network for People In Need. It is the eHarmony for People Helping People! The Make A Wish Foundation where you are the star. There are only a hand full of celebrities, but there are millions of people who can give of their time, their advice, their services or their fortunate financial well being. HelpJester is a vehicle to change the lives of all involved...in a very positive way.

HelpJester Needs Your Help...

HelpJester is a fully developed idea without the funds to move forward. Every day that goes by is another lost opportunity to connect the fortunate among us with those less fortunate. This is your chance to contribute to a cause for all causes...safe in the knowledge that 100% of the funds will be used to help millions in need.

This idea was born of my own adversity. My own devastating life challenges led me to the development of an idea that will change lives forever! It will change how we look at those in need and provide a non-judgmental community of people helping people.

Read more at HelpJester: The Birth of An Idea Through Adversity (helpjester.wordpress.com)

My Commitment

I so believe in the working practice of this concept that I've committed my life to seeing that it becomes available to all who seek to help or be helped. I'm a humble man with humble means. I've learned, over the years, the power and peace that comes with the gift of giving. Giving promotes healing in any and all ways. For the Helper as well as the Helpee. This is the ideal that HelpJester was founded on. This is just one way that makes HelpJester truly unique.

How does it work and what makes us different?

Of the hundreds of successful fundraising sites online today, HelpJester is the only site that will electronically match those in need with someone who can help. Our eMatching capabilities and interconnecting social network creates a unique and personal experience that all other fundraising sites have overlooked.

HelpJester is a true Non-Profit organization. Most high profile organizations keep a substantial percentage of your donation for administrative fees and costs. HelpJester ensures that 100% of each giving member's gift goes directly to the individual or group making the request.

As a visitor of HelpJester.com, you will be encouraged to register for FREE and create a personal profile, tell your story and be matched with an individual, group or business who can help you in your time of need. There is no cost to becoming a member of our community!

Helpers will be asked to do the same, but instead of posting a request, they will be choosing a category in which they feel they can be the most helpful. They will then receive emails or messages, including a selection of individuals or groups with a request from their category. The Helper will then review these selections, find a story or individual that they feel a connection with and contact that person or group directly. It’s that simple!

HelpJester will also be host to “Featured Causes”. HelpJester will be the premier site for people helping people.

A way for all to assist in large scale efforts of fund raising. A monthly or quarterly home page feature, designed to focus on a highlighted cause. Veterans, feeding the hungry or victims of a natural disaster such as the recent devistation caused by Hurricane Sandy.

HelpJester's Kid's Corner

As HelpJester grows, we will be including a Kid's Corner for parents who would like to see their children experience, at an early age, the gift of giving and how empowering the experience of helping another human being can be. This is an opportunity to bring parents and children together in a worth while activity and create another generation of generosity.

Lemonade stands to help raise money for Hurricane Sandy victims, collecting clothes or toys that they could give to a family who's struggling over the holidays. There are many ways for children to get involved and experience the joy that comes with giving.

Without the means to give financially? You can still help...

If you can't afford to give financially, give of your time...to this fundraiser and later as a member of the HelpJester community. Right now, take a moment to share this fundraiser with everyone you know. The tools you need are provided right here on this site. This moment of your time will, ultimately, help in the creation of this concept and help millions in the process. Almost everyone can do something useful for others to strengthen the fabric of our shared humanity. The feeling you will experience for this unselfish act is the principle of this idea and is unmatched by riches and excess. Giving is a privilege. 

Who We Are, What We Need & What You Get

HelpJester.com is the World’s First eMatching Social Network for People In Need. 

A non-judgmental online community of helpers and helpees. Rich or poor, majority or minority, Democrat or Republican, spiritual or not, HelpJester provides something for everyone. It is a vehicle to change the lives of all who participate. 

This is an original concept. An aspect of social networking and crowd funding that has been ignored, until now. While other social media sites find solace in fun quotes, birthday reminders and the occasional vacation photo, HelpJester is an online community that makes a difference. 

My partnering team of developers, programmers, marketing individuals and accounting professionals are as excited as I am about the global implications of HelpJester and the good it can do for those in need around the world. Virtual Land Grab (http://www.virtuallandgrab.com), based out of Utah, will be a crucial part of this concept and its development. They understand and fully share my vision of partnering together to promote a community of people helping people and how this process can change the world.

All of the funds collected here will go to the development, programming, legal services and marketing of HelpJester. We have not padded our goal amount to compensate for prizes and perks. We hope that your generosity is rewarded by the action of giving to help those in need and not for perk's sake. Let's not wait for HelpJester to launch. Let's start this wonderful process of giving, without expecting anything in return, by allowing your dollars to go directly to the process rather than perks?

That being said, we would like to acknowledge those who go above and beyond in helping us meet our goal. There will be recognition to Founding Members, as well as advertising packages suited for each individual or businesses specific needs. These are just some of the perks that we will be able to offer, while still assuring that 100% of your contribution will go directly to the creation and development of HelpJester.com.

With Gratitude...

For those of you who have contributed, we are truly grateful. Truly. Your selflessness provides us with great hope for HelpJester's future. For those without the means to give right now, we understand. HelpJester will soon be there for you and your needs. We simply hope that you will do what you can, by way of sharing our message and this fundraiser with family, friends and even passers by. You never know. You could be the link to a major contributor...just for taking a moment to share.

This is the ideal that HelpJester was founded on. This is just one way that makes HelpJester truly unique.
How does it work and what makes us different?
Of the hundreds of successful fundraising sites online today, HelpJester is the only site that will electronically match those in need with someone who can help. Our eMatching capabilities and interconnecting social network creates a unique and personal experience that all other fundraising sites have overlooked.
HelpJester is a true Non-Profit organization. Most high profile organizations keep a substantial percentage of your donation for administrative fees and costs. HelpJester ensures that 100% of each giving member's gift goes directly to the individual or group making the request.
As a visitor of HelpJester.com, you will be encouraged to register for FREE and create a personal profile, tell your story and be matched with an individual, group or business who can help you in your time of need. There is no cost to becoming a member of our community!
Helpers will be asked to do the same, but instead of posting a request, they will be choosing a category in which they feel they can be the most helpful. They will then receive emails or messages, including a selection of individuals or groups with a request from their category. The Helper will then review these selections, find a story or individual that they feel a connection with and contact that person or group directly. It’s that simple!
HelpJester will also be host to “Featured Causes”. HelpJester will be the premier site for people helping people.
A way for all to assist in large scale efforts of fund raising. A monthly or quarterly home page feature, designed to focus on a highlighted cause. Veterans, feeding the hungry or victims of a natural disaster such as the recent devistation caused by Hurricane Sandy.
HelpJester's Kid's Corner
As HelpJester grows, we will be including a Kid's Corner for parents who would like to see their children experience, at an early age, the gift of giving and how empowering the experience of helping another human being can be. This is an opportunity to bring parents and children together in a worth while activity and create another generation of generosity.
Lemonade stands to help raise money for Hurricane Sandy victims, collecting clothes or toys that they could give to a family who's struggling over the holidays. There are many ways for children to get involved and experience the joy that comes with giving.
Without the means to give financially? You can still help...
If you can't afford to give financially, give of your time...to this fundraiser and later as a member of the HelpJester community. Right now, take a moment to share this fundraiser with everyone you know. The tools you need are provided right here on this site. This moment of your time will, ultimately, help in the creation of this concept and help millions in the process. Almost everyone can do something useful for others to strengthen the fabric of our shared humanity. The feeling you will experience for this unselfish act is the principle of this idea and is unmatched by riches and excess. Giving is a privilege. 


Who We Are, What We Need & What You Get
HelpJester.com is the World’s First eMatching Social Network for People In Need. 
A non-judgmental online community of helpers and helpees. Rich or poor, majority or minority, Democrat or Republican, spiritual or not, HelpJester provides something for everyone. It is a vehicle to change the lives of all who participate. 
This is an original concept. An aspect of social networking and crowd funding that has been ignored, until now. While other social media sites find solace in fun quotes, birthday reminders and the occasional vacation photo, HelpJester is an online community that makes a difference. 
My partnering team of developers, programmers, marketing individuals and accounting professionals are as excited as I am about the global implications of HelpJester and the good it can do for those in need around the world. Virtual Land Grab (http://www.virtuallandgrab.com), based out of Utah, will be a crucial part of this concept and its development. They understand and fully share my vision of partnering together to promote a community of people helping people and how this process can change the world.
All of the funds collected here will go to the development, programming, legal services and marketing of HelpJester. We have not padded our goal amount to compensate for prizes and perks. We hope that your generosity is rewarded by the action of giving to help those in need and not for perk's sake. Let's not wait for HelpJester to launch. Let's start this wonderful process of giving, without expecting anything in return, by allowing your dollars to go directly to the process rather than perks?
That being said, we would like to acknowledge those who go above and beyond in helping us meet our goal. There will be recognition to Founding Members, as well as advertising packages suited for each individual or businesses specific needs. These are just some of the perks that we will be able to offer, while still assuring that 100% of your contribution will go directly to the creation and development of HelpJester.com.
With Gratitude...
For those of you who have contributed, we are truly grateful. Truly. Your selflessness provides us with great hope for HelpJester's future. For those without the means to give right now, we understand. HelpJester will soon be there for you and your needs. We simply hope that you will do what you can, by way of sharing our message and this fundraiser with family, friends and even passers by. You never know. You could be the link to a major contributor...just for taking a moment to share.

story:
Short Summary

I have a dream of people, families and communities becoming healthy through functional fitness and daily lifestyle choices, as a team. I believe it will strengthen the entire community. I dream of adults and kids alike actually enjoying their "workouts!" I dream of a community growing not only closer, but also growing slimmer TOGETHER! I dream of a community consisting of people helping people. People encouraging each other towards accomplishing each of our unique, personal health goals!

Fitness.Reset embodies this vision. 

Fitness.Reset’s focus is health through diet and fitness. It’s not about specialized, expensive equipment. It’s about linking social life, exercise, and a nutritious diet into a standard of living that promotes health and fitness.

We seek to revolutionize the way people think about working out. Want to turn a chore that is mundane and solely results driven into something fun. We are creating a lifestyle change that will lead to positive driving forces, instead of being steered by fear of fat or obligation, all while ending with superior results. We will be inspiring people to want to change themselves.

We plan on affiliation through Crossfit as a main part of our plan due largely to the current success and their model of functional fitness. Their model lines up right alongside of our goals and our vision. They choose principles, morals and functionality over equipment, sales and most importantly over profit! We could not agree more!!

What We Need & What You Get

Ideally we would like around $25,000-$30,000 in total startup costs for Building Rent, Equipment Cost, and Certification and Affiliation Fees. We plan on doing 3 Campaigns to help us work towards this goal. We want to be as debt free as possible, not to mention we want to be a local, community supported business.

Our Phases will consist of:

Phase 1- Equipment Costs approximately $3,500.

Phase 2- Building Rent, approximately $16,500.

Phase 3- Crossfit Certification and Affiliation Costs approximately $5,000.

This equals about $25,000. That is before any fees or perks are paid out for our campaign. That is wherein lies the push for $30,000. WE WANT TO SPOIL OUR SUPPORTERS!! HELP US BE ABLE TO DO JUST THAT!!

Everything that is above each campaign goal will be rolled towards our next Phase! If we happen to go beyond our Entire Goal then that money will be used to add value to our facility by adding more/different equipment and/or upgrade our location options!

We have many great perk options! We are open to anything you can do to help further our dream facility! Small or large everything is GREATLY APPRECIATED!! 

If we do not meet our goal, we will put the funds towards whatever equipment we can get. We will purchase the equipment and put it to use at our garage gym until a Carmel location is acquired!

The Impact

As we all know, Americans are becoming increasingly overweight and worse, obese. Our goal is to start teaching people, families and communities how to take small, simple everyday steps towards eradicating these very preventable scenarios.

Our goal is beneficial not only to our specific community, but to the whole state and country because we see in the future the possibility of being able to build "affiliates" and show them how to run a community-minded fitness facility based off of our success. We also have plans for an online training program that we will use to monitor your success across the great internet!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some times you just can’t contribute money, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!

YOU CAN HELP!

I ask you to help spread the word of our goal to anyone and everyone that may be able to help further our cause! Send our page out to everyone you may know!!!!!

Remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Till the End of the Campaign for every $5.00 donated one ticket will go to a low income family of Cornwall, Ontario. Together we can make sure every child gets a chance to go.

Hello World, My Name is Scott Gardiner, a husband, a father, a history buff and I am a lifetime gamer. (note about the video,  being dyslexic reading out load or memorizing a script is real difficult for me, after 83 attempts this was the best I could do, I didn't get someone to read it for me because I believe the the project creator needs to make the case for himself)

What is the Game Room Interactive Museum? The Game Room Interactive Museum is a brand-new concept.   It is a gaming museum where you get to use the equipment and play the games. Our goal is to be able to provide 100 plus machines from Pinball to PC's, from Commodore to PlayStation, from Pong to Batman VR and over 100 traditional board games. We are committed to teaching the history of gaming, the companies, the systems and game design, while you enjoy playing the games. Each gaming unit will have a brief history of the company, the unit, lists of best selling games and memorabilia when available. We are hoping to provide each game with its manual, and examples of classic print advertising. We also wish to provide and an extensive library of gaming magazines, Roleplaying games and other gaming related materials you can enjoy over a cup of coffee.

The Game Room is trying to trail blaze a new way to run a museum, we are focused on immersion instead of viewing and in that vein our business plan is a bit different from for typical museum. Most museums are non-profit, they survive on government grants, loans, and admissions and many public fundraisers. Most private businesses take out huge loans, use government grants which increases the price to the public. We are going with a for profit model, between a low admission price and an internal coffee shop, we believe, we can make this museum self sufficient so we don't have to keep going to the government and public year after year. We choose the crowdfunding model for a simple reason it will keep the admission fee low, if we had to take out a start up loan a big portion of the business income would go to paying the loan which would make the admission fee $12-15.00 per person. If we could raise the money via crowdfunding the admission fee would only be $5.00 and children under 10 would get in free accompanied by a paying adult. I would really like to make The Game Room Interactive Museum as affordable to as many people as possible.Therefore, we need your help. I have three different plans depending on the support I receive from you.

The Game Room needs $15000.00, with that money I'll be able to provide a 2500 - 3000 square foot museum with between 80 to 100 units including pinball machines, a jukebox, rarer consoles like the Panasonic 3DO or the Atari Jaguar and an extensive selection of games. Other things the money will be used for are to help with the furniture and display costs, (I found a master woodworker that is willing to donate his time to build the stands and displays). Various other things that would make the experience better such as better lighting, more artifacts to display and of course the givebacks. If the fundraiser goes super and we exceed our goal the money will be put into more gaming systems and a better game selection with a bigger facility.

 

If for some reason we don't hit the goal, The Game Room Interactive Museum will scale back proportionally. To a smaller place, with less stuff, I believe the museum will be able to grow from what ever we start from, even if the Game Room started as a coffee shop with a mini museum.

 

I want to bring this concept to Cornwall, Ontario, Canada. Why Cornwall? A lot of people have asked me that over the last month. I feel its important to explain why I'm choosing to bring this project to a City with almost 50 000 people, Instead of one of the major Canadian cities. Cornwall is located on the St Lawrence River in eastern Ontario. We have a bridge to the USA, we are 1 hour west of Montreal and 1 hour South East of Ottawa and 2 hours east of Kingston. We believe that makes Cornwall a perfect day trip location for people in those Cities. In Cornwall the costs of doing business is much lower then the major centers which allows me to keep prices affordable. Cornwall also strong "geek" sub section of its population, as Cornwall and area Pop event (CAPE) http://www.cornwallpopevent.com/ has proven with 5k+ attending that event this year. The biggest reason is this is my home, born and raised here, I've spent time living in different cities around Canada and choose Cornwall to raise my family in, now it's time to do something exciting for the community, something that will increase tourism, employ a few people, and give the community a family friendly, affordable place to go. Another way the Game Room will impact the community will be all admissions on the second Saturday of a month will be donated to one of our local charities, such as Agape Center. It will be a different local charity per month, chosen on an online vote just before our projected launch date. I feel strongly about local businesses being socially responsible, this is one way The Game Room can help our community. I also developed a plan for small businesses to sponsor machines, which will be a very effective advertising program. Its a way for local businesses, not only help the Game Room but themselves as well.  

 

This project will be a valuable addition to our community, eastern Ontario and the retro gaming community at large. When I first launched this project on Facebook a bit more then a month ago, The Game room went from 2 consoles ,1 PC and 25 board games to 43 systems, 67 different board games and 14 CRT TV's. We went from zero to over 350 followers on Facebook and over 50 followers on Twitter, about half of the garage sales I have visited have heard of the Game Room so word of mouth is getting around the city. That shows me with only advertising on Facebook and Twitter that there is a demand for this museum. The Game Room was also asked to participate in Coticon (Cornwall's Tiny Con) http://www.coticon.com/ to supply vintage games for the public to play. It will take place on August 19, 2017. Approximately 41 days before our projected opening of October 1, 2017.  I have also been approached to do interviews with 2 of the local papers in the near future. The Community is showing their excitement for this project and we are very grateful for it.

 

This is my Dream, with your help it can come true.

 

Perks

 

As you can see on the list. I tried to focus on passes to the Game Room, as the Thank You for Your Support. I have also set up multiple ways to offer Advertising space to companies by a special machine sponsorship program. We also developed a great way to say thank you for your Donation $5.00 and above will received via Facebook a Digital Picture of me Dressed up as the classic Iron man holding a Thank you sign with your Name on it (Or a Name of your Choice) on a busy street corner in Cornwall, Ontario.

 

Risks & Challenges

To achieve success with a project of this magnitude, we need to get not only the community of Cornwall behind us, we also need the greater surrounding area and the retro gaming community at large.   

 

Its always risky buying old equipment. Equipment 30+ years old needs maintenance, parts and were never quite sure how much life is left in it. A lot of the maintenance I can do myself such as cleaning and basic repair work, for major repairs we would have to take it in to an electronics technician. To compound the problem these machines will be used, hopefully used a lot, that creates more turn over for repairs or replacement machines.  One of the goals of the museum is to have a spare for key machines to replace if one goes down.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

There are lots of ways you can show your support. Word of mouth for instance is been long proven the most effective way of advertising. So, talk to your family and friends get them excited for the Game Room and show them the campaign. That excitement is infectious, get them to talk to there friends and family Join me on Facebook and Twitter. Share the posts, take part in the conversations, ask your friends and family to share. Do you know business owners looking for a different way of advertising? Are you? Let them know about this. 

 

There is a saying "No man is an Island" and there is a lot of truth to that.  No one can make it with out the support of some sort people like friends, family and mentors. Without your help, this project. this dream would be extremely difficult if not impossible to achieve.

 

Thank You

I would like to take a minute and thank you for your consideration, the help and support that you have given me. I would also like to Thank a few people who have helped this project get this far either by donating equipment, playing devil's advocate to make sure I thought it all through, also letting me use them as a sounding board to bounce ideas off, and help me pick up equipment. People like Randy Sauve, Barry Gasque, Gary Flaro, Mary Patrick, Richard Perras and George Gardiner. A special Thank You to, Jamie and Connor Gardiner for being patient with me for 83 takes while making the video.  Plus, a Thank You to John Bissonnette for lending me a covered trailer to store some of the equipment in. Without these people and some others, I wouldn't have gotten this far so thank you. Also, a special thank you to my wife Wendy and our children  for putting up with the amount of equipment (or as they see it clutter) in our home.

 

Update 1

 

There has been a amazing amount of interest so far into this Project. Thank You so much for your support. The main Facebook post broke a 6000 people reach in the first 24hrs. with 50 shares and on the Indiegogo campaign Page we managed to drive 712 people there, with 2 donations. I know most people that intend to donate like to wait. Don't wait the more people donating even at a small $5.00 level increases the Game Room Ranking in Indiegogo. The higher the Ranking there is more of a chance of people seeing the campaign. Also people not only donate because of a good idea, a big reason why people will donate is if its popular and already getting donations coming.

The Game Room Interactive Museum will happen I can make sure of that. How big it will be? How many systems will be there? How huge of a selection of games will be there? Will there be a Jukebox there? How many pinball machine's will be there? Those questions can only be answered by you and your support.

To my supporters, Game Room Fans, the Retro gamer Community and to the people of Cornwall together we have a chance to build a museum. To do something that will help our city by providing a major tourist attraction, a low cost family friendly safe place for teen's, children, adults and families a place to go. In Cornwall there is not much here for young people you can go to a restaurant, see a movie, go to a bar or hang out at the mall or a Tim Horton's Parking lot.

Together let's do something special for our community. Help me bring The Game Room interactive Museum to life. Don't Wait donate and share now.

Day 3 update

This is a massive project. I spent the day yesterday tending to social media, contacting bloggers and press about the project hoping to get help from them to spread the word. Plus working on an old MacIntosh computer. We are up to 117 followers on twitter, 397 followers on Facebook. The Campaign has been shared over 100 times, and 8 re-tweets. Its a good strong start.https://www.indiegogo.com/…/the-game-room-int... can get involved with this project, we need to raise our visibility on the net and we need to increase our indiegogo ranking so more people will see the project. I would like everyone to Share this project today. If everyone could share this post on their timeline and comment on the thread. It would give the campaign a must needed boost. If you know me include "Please donate to my (friend/family member) campaign." people you know would be much more likely to help with the campaign if you asked them to.

We also need to increase our indiegogo ranking. Indiegogo gets an average of 9 million unique visitors per month. So the higher rank the game room has more people will get to see the campaign. The more people that donate increases the ranking and it doesn't have to be huge donations, just donation traffic raises the ranking. So don't be shy, or think a small 2 - 5 dollar donation won't help because what we need right know, is we need every fan, every person who wants to visit the museum, everyone who wants to see this Campaign a success and everyone who likes me (even if you don't like me that is OK too) to donate $2 or $5 dollars (more if you want ) today. Show the world how badly the people of Cornwall wants this project to succeed.

I would also like to Thank a few people who have helped this project get this far either by donating equipment, playing devil's advocate to make sure I thought it all through, also letting me use them as a sounding board to bounce ideas off, and help me pick up equipment. People like Randy Sauve, Barry Gasque, Gary Flaro, Mary Patrick, Richard Perras and George Gardiner. A special Thank You to, Jamie and Connor Gardiner for being patient with me for 83 takes while making the video.  Plus, a Thank You to John Bissonnette for lending me a covered trailer to store some of the equipment in. Without these people and some others, I wouldn't have gotten this far so thank you. Also, a special thank you to my wife Wendy and our children  for putting up with the amount of equipment (or as they see it clutter) in our home.
 
Update 1

 
There has been a amazing amount of interest so far into this Project. Thank You so much for your support. The main Facebook post broke a 6000 people reach in the first 24hrs. with 50 shares and on the Indiegogo campaign Page we managed to drive 712 people there, with 2 donations. I know most people that intend to donate like to wait. Don't wait the more people donating even at a small $5.00 level increases the Game Room Ranking in Indiegogo. The higher the Ranking there is more of a chance of people seeing the campaign. Also people not only donate because of a good idea, a big reason why people will donate is if its popular and already getting donations coming.
The Game Room Interactive Museum will happen I can make sure of that. How big it will be? How many systems will be there? How huge of a selection of games will be there? Will there be a Jukebox there? How many pinball machine's will be there? Those questions can only be answered by you and your support.
To my supporters, Game Room Fans, the Retro gamer Community and to the people of Cornwall together we have a chance to build a museum. To do something that will help our city by providing a major tourist attraction, a low cost family friendly safe place for teen's, children, adults and families a place to go. In Cornwall there is not much here for young people you can go to a restaurant, see a movie, go to a bar or hang out at the mall or a Tim Horton's Parking lot.
Together let's do something special for our community. Help me bring The Game Room interactive Museum to life. Don't Wait donate and share now.
Day 3 update
This is a massive project. I spent the day yesterday tending to social media, contacting bloggers and press about the project hoping to get help from them to spread the word. Plus working on an old MacIntosh computer. We are up to 117 followers on twitter, 397 followers on Facebook. The Campaign has been shared over 100 times, and 8 re-tweets. Its a good strong start.https://www.indiegogo.com/…/the-game-room-int... can get involved with this project, we need to raise our visibility on the net and we need to increase our indiegogo ranking so more people will see the project. I would like everyone to Share this project today. If everyone could share this post on their timeline and comment on the thread. It would give the campaign a must needed boost. If you know me include "Please donate to my (friend/family member) campaign." people you know would be much more likely to help with the campaign if you asked them to.
We also need to increase our indiegogo ranking. Indiegogo gets an average of 9 million unique visitors per month. So the higher rank the game room has more people will get to see the campaign. The more people that donate increases the ranking and it doesn't have to be huge donations, just donation traffic raises the ranking. So don't be shy, or think a small 2 - 5 dollar donation won't help because what we need right know, is we need every fan, every person who wants to visit the museum, everyone who wants to see this Campaign a success and everyone who likes me (even if you don't like me that is OK too) to donate $2 or $5 dollars (more if you want ) today. Show the world how badly the people of Cornwall wants this project to succeed.

story:
BECOME A VENTURE CAPITALIST

 

Sailors NYC is still looking for potential serious venture capitalists who would be interested in investing in our start-up. Whether you are a VC or know people who are – please send them our way: info@sailorsnyc.com

 

SAILORS NYC INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

 

Sailors NYC launched its crowdfunding marketing campaign via Indiegogo on December 2012. The idea was to introduce Sailors NYC to the world and to raise awareness of New Yorkers to “the new kid on the block”. In 45 days we succeeded to get thousands of engagements via social media, as well as generate funds which will be used as start-up capital for the business in its first days.

 

WE WISH TO THANK: 1,200 unique viewers of the campaign video, 84 funders who contributed a sum of $3,221, 3 businesses who joined us to promote this effort , 50 new likes to our facebook page (an increase of 33%!), 130 new followers on our Twitter account (an increase of 350%!), over 3,000 on social media personal introductions to prospective investors, clients, sponsors and vendors and all to all good vibes!

 

SEE YOU AT SEA WITH SAILORS NYC!

 

At a bird's view

My name is Nitzan Levy and I'm an a Israeli licensed captain and a marketing professional. Upon my arrival to NYC I was eager to sail around. I was surprised I couldn't find anything but very limited sailing options (seasonal day sailing on 24' boats). As an established entrepreneur I saw saw a business opportunity and decided to open a sailors club that could provide year-round activities and a fleet of medium sized (30'-40') sailing vessels.

After 10 months of intensive research and meeting with hundreds of NYC Metro Area sailors, my gut feeling got a solid confirmation. NYC sailors are currently commuting hours in order to get a decent sailing experience, while the stunning sites of the NYC skyline is right around their corner!

Supporting us today will guarentee the opening of an exciting sailing season in May 2013 and the opening of more recreational sailing adventures to the people of the New York Metro Area!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $100,000:

  • $25,000 to secure slips in a local marina

  • $35,000 for covering annual costs of boat maintenance of two boats

  • $15,000 – to cover renovation expenses of creating a sailors' club house at the marina

  • $25,000 - to cover expenses required enabling us to offer a decent racing program on 4 boats.such as: purchase of chase boats and program development

Check out our exciting perks to the right of this page!

The Impact

Sailing brings people together, enhances their social and professional skills and their life perspective. Good sailors are not being measured by their sailing level but also by their spirit, passion and connection to nature and respecting its elements.

As mentioned above - in the past 10 months I met and sailed with hundreds of sailors in the NYC Metro Area. These encounters created a large network of sailors of all ages and businesses of various industries that are following our efforts and supporting our efforts in different ways: from connecting us to more people who share the same interest through attending our monthly meetups to donating their time and professional skills to help promote this exiting venture.

Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from supporting us financially – we are constantly looking to expanding our network of sailing enthusiasts. We would appreciate your assistance in building this community by:

  • Spreading the word about this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of this page as well as sharing it via email

  • Connecting us with individuals and companies who are interested in getting involved with our mission and benefit from it (e.g. - potential investors for bigger $$$ :-))

  • Joining our meetup group

See you on the water!

story:
What is quidditch?

Quidditch is the new sport that can be found across the U.S at most college campuses! It is a game derived from the Harry Potter novels, but it has quickly become much more!

  • Quidditch is a mix of rugby, dodgeball, tag, and soccer
  • It is one of the only co-ed, full contact sport on college campuses

Who are we?

The ISU Firebirds

  • We formed in the fall of 2010, and have rapidly grown to a team of roughly 60 members
  • We travel to many tournaments, as well as host our own each year
  • We receive no school funding for equipment, travel, or tournament fees. We fundraise year-long to afford to keep our team going!

What is the money for?

To help the ISU team afford hosting our Rockford tournament! Money goes towards:

  • The cost of lining two fields
  • The cost of bleachers
  • The cost of EMT's for two days
  • The cost to book the field for the weekend
  • And much more!

How to play Quidditch:

Quidditch is easiest when described with an image:

More about the Rock River Tournament:

  • We aim to host around 12-16 teams
  • There will be two fields, with pool play before seeded bracket play
  • ISU has been working closely with the Rockford CVB to bring quidditch to their town
  • This tournament is a preview of what Rockford has to offer quidditch, and next year we hope to bring quidditch to Rockford again but for the World Cup!

How to help:

  • Spread the word on this campaign!
  • Contribute to this campaign!

story: Our friend Ashley Grams' house burned down on September 11. Everything she, her husband, and two children owned was lost in the fire. They have had to spend all their savings just to get their daily necessities. We are collecting donations to help them through this difficult time. Anything you give will be greatly appreciated!

They have had to spend all their savings just to get their daily necessities. We are collecting donations to help them through this difficult time. Anything you give will be greatly appreciated!

story:
Short Summary

hOMe was inspired by my mother. For the past twelve years my mother has been severly sick due to multiple spine surgeries and an addiction to pain killers. Her illness and our lack of a relationship growing up drove me into an obbsession with natural medicine since I only saw western medicine make mother more and more sick over the years. I was sure that if I could learn about healing naturally, I could help my mother heal. Six years after my first encounter with yoga, and two years after my first teacher training my dream came true. I watched my mother heal herself in threee months after committing to yoga, a raw vegan diet, herbs and supplements, and accupuncture treatment. She is now free from her addiction, walks without a cane, healed her depression, lost over 30 pounds and first the first time in a long time is happy and healthy. Her transformation inspired us to teach others how they too could heal. We came up with project hOMe. An actual house that we would convert into a wellness center completely ran off of donations. Most natural alternative medicine is very expensive and not covered by insurance. Since we do not have the money to open hOMe, we started with the resources we did have, a network of healers in the valley willing to help in parks and rec centers as well as churches churches completely off of donations. Thus Outside OM was created. Outside OM is yoga, healing sessions, reiki, massage, and raw diet counciling all for donations around the city in the places the welcome us in. We have created a community of people healing themselves and healing eachother. The only thing missing is a place to call hOMe.

What We Need & What You Get

We would love to buy or build a house that we can completely pay off. Paying off the house will allow our healers to practice at the hOMe without paying rent to use the space. This will allow the healing center to be ran completely by donations. The donations go to the person practicing the healing or teaching the classes. We feel that this creates a win/win situation. The guest can afford the healing they deserve and the person giving can afford to make a living giving this amazing gift instead of a commercial leasing space demanding rent money causes the cost of healing sessions to be set in stone.

Eventually we would love to start the hOMe and Outside OM movements in multiple cities buliding healing hOMes across the world.

If you or any of your loved ones have suffered from addiction or suffer from life hindering illness like my family did, than hOMe can become your hOMe too. Healing should be available to everyone and so should the knowledge about natural healing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word! If you know anyone who might be interested in offering a lending hand please refer them to us! We are always looking for teachers, healers, natural medicine practicioners, chinese medicine doctors, yoga instructors, energy work practicioners, massage therapists, raw food experts, and all other forms of natural healing.

OutsideOM@yahoo.com

story:
Everyone has noticed how our youth is not the same as it once was. Children and Teens seem to be much more distant from families. Across the country, we have seen many horrible crimes at the hands of young citizens. I believe that if some of those children had maybe a different environment or an extra helping hand they could reach out to, those crimes may have been avoidable.

 

My name is Sgt. Antonio Perez; I am a recently separated Veteran. I served in the United States Army from 2004-2012. I enlisted at the age of 17 and from the moment I arrived I attained a sense of leadership that allowed me to assist others. I moved into training many other soldiers in physical fitness as well as in combatives bas in Brazilian Jui-Jitsu. I did several tours overseas and upon my return I became part of the MMA world training at various gyms.

 

I have always been fascinated with the world of training, fitness, and self-defense but I wanted to find a way to give back to the community. MMA has taken the world by storm, people and children of all ages know what it is. Everyone wants to be in better shape and want to raise healthy children but that costs money.  Well, I would like to help the community make those dreams come true.

 

 I want to offer low cost mixed martial arts, self-defense, cross fit and health seminars available to all children from ages 7-18. I would like to have a mode of transportation, such as a school bus, to bring the children from their school to our training facility. This would eliminate  the need for afterschool care and make the services we offer easily accessible to all. We would also have a meal provided to each of our students and we would create a safe environment with trained personnel with child care experience as well as a counselor and nurse on site.

 

 I want children to be able to have a support group and develop social skills as well as perform team building activities to promote healthy relationships. Students will also be prompted to obtain better grade because we would reward based on report cards.  All children will receive necessary equipment and uniforms to participate in program thus eliminating the need for parents to incur extra expenses. All students will receive an identification card that will log when they arrive and depart, as well as give information as to who can pick them up from the facility.

 

 The funds needed are to compliment funds I have put towards this goal. They will primarily go to the purchase of the building as well as the equipment needed to set up the gym. The goal is $20,000 and I would be ecstatic if we could reach that goal but in the event that we don’t, I will continue to pursue the establishment of the training facility on a smaller scale. If you cannot donate a large amount of money, remember anything helps. If you believe in the cause please share this information and direct others to my campaign. There are many ways to contribute. I am also looking for volunteers or any trained licensed professional that would like to assist who can successfully pass a background screening with drug test.

 

The well-being of our children is at stake and I believe we can make a difference. If you are tired of seeing teens and young adults struggle, assist me in reaching the goal. If your children are too old for day care or you cannot afford after school care, why not put them in a program that will allow them to better themselves physically, emotionally, and mentally.

story:
Hello! I am Rory Holliday and I am a 29 year old Computer Information Systems student. I have been working with computers since I was  14, I just have never had any institutional experince. I love working on computers and seeing what I can do with them, which brings me to my project.

I recently received a Raspberry Pi, which is a micro computer that is the size of a credit card. People all over the world have created millions of different projects with these tiny machines from home automation to making it say "Hello World" on a tiny screen. 

What I want to do is make a 7 inch laptop mounted inside of a hardcover book, using the Raspberry Pi and a 7" LCD screen. I want to make it completely portable, so that all you have to do is recharge the power supply when you're at home. I have the idea and all the experience and knowledge to do so, I just do not have the funds.

Your contributions will help me make at least 2 of these devices, and any contributions I receive over the initial pledge mark will go towards the purchase of more. You will help me start a business from the ground floor, and if you pledge me money I will give you priority for purchasing a finished device. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

I need the funds to puchase the electronic components to make this device, 

  • a portable 7" LCD screen
  • a portable usb power supply rated at 10000mAh or more
  • a 4 port powered usb hub
  • a wifi dongle
  • a usb keyboard with a trackpad 
  • a used hardcover book
  • an 8gig Sd card
  • a 32-64gb USB flash drive
  • a soldering iron
  • assorted cables and other small tools

All this will cost me between $200 - $250 

I will make at least 2 of these devices and I will give one to the highest pledger.

To any one who pledges $50 or more I will give a year of free Remote Tech Support provided by myself.

To anyone who pledges $5 or more you will get priority for ordering any additional units I produce, whether the units are made from supplies you helped purchase or not.

If I do not reach my funding goal any funds I receive will still go towards this business venture and I will still keep to my pledge promises listed above.

The Impact

When the Raspberry Pi was introduced to the world it took it by storm, a cheap computer that anyone can afford!

But it doesn't come with a monitor, keyboard, functional operating system, or wifi. you have to go out and provide stuff like that yourself and then build it!

Well I want to make a cheap laptop that doesn't look horrible and it easily carried anywhere. I want to make it available for anyone to purchase, and I want to make it cheap!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word, if you like this idea or know someone who would like this idea, spread the word.
